Recipe Name: Smoked Salmon and Cream Cheese Bagels
Description: A classic deli-style bagel loaded with silky smoked salmon, tangy cream cheese, and crisp red onion.
Ingredients: 2 plain bagels, split and toasted. 6 ounces smoked salmon, thinly sliced. 6 ounces cream cheese, softened. 2 tablespoons capers, drained. 1 small red onion, thinly sliced. 1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped. Lemon wedges, optional. Freshly ground black pepper
Instructions: 1. Toast the bagel halves until golden. 2. Spread cream cheese evenly on each cut side. 3. Layer smoked salmon over the bottom halves. 4. Top with red onion, capers, and dill. 5. Season with black pepper, add a squeeze of lemon, and cap with the top halves.

Description: A hearty morning sandwich with soft eggs and melted cheddar on a toasted bagel.
Ingredients: 2 plain bagels, split. 4 large eggs. 2 slices cheddar cheese. 1 tablespoon butter. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Toast the bagel halves and set aside. 2. Heat butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat. 3. Crack in the eggs and cook to desired doneness, seasoning with salt and pepper. 4. Place a slice of cheddar on two warm bagel halves to melt slightly. 5. Add the eggs, top with remaining halves, and serve hot.

Description: A fresh, colorful bagel packed with creamy avocado and crisp vegetables for a satisfying bite.
Ingredients: 2 whole wheat bagels, split and toasted. 1 large ripe avocado, sliced. 1 medium tomato, sliced. 1 small cucumber, thinly sliced. 1 cup sprouts or baby greens. 2 teaspoons lemon juice. 2 teaspoons olive oil. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. In a small bowl, mix lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 2. Toast the bagel halves. 3. Layer avocado, tomato, cucumber, and sprouts on the bottom halves. 4. Drizzle with the lemon oil mixture. 5. Cap with the top halves and serve.

Description: A quick, kid-friendly snack with zesty sauce, melty mozzarella, and crispy pepperoni.
Ingredients: 2 plain bagels, split. 1/2 cup pizza sauce. 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese. 2 ounces sliced pepperoni. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1 teaspoon olive oil
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 F. 2. Arrange bagel halves on a baking sheet and brush with olive oil. 3. Spread pizza sauce over each half. 4. Top with mozzarella and pepperoni, then sprinkle with oregano. 5. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until cheese is melted and edges are crisp.

Recipe Name: Cinnamon Raisin Bagels with Honey Walnut Cream Cheese
Description: A sweet and creamy spread over toasted cinnamon raisin bagels for a cozy breakfast treat.
Ingredients: 2 cinnamon raisin bagels, split and toasted. 4 ounces cream cheese, softened. 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts, toasted. 2 teaspoons honey. 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
Instructions: 1. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, walnuts, honey, and cinnamon until smooth. 2. Toast the bagels to your liking. 3. Spread the honey walnut cream cheese over warm bagel halves. 4. Serve open faced or as a sandwich. 5. Enjoy immediately.

Recipe Name: Classic Egg and Sausage Breakfast Burritos
Description: A hearty, classic breakfast wrap loaded with eggs, sausage, potatoes, and melty cheddar.
Ingredients: 4 large flour tortillas. 8 large eggs. 8 oz pork breakfast sausage, casings removed. 2 cups diced russet potatoes. 1 cup diced red bell pepper. 1/2 cup diced onion. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese. 1/2 cup salsa. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook the sausage, breaking it up, until browned and cooked through. Transfer to a bowl. 2. In the same skillet add olive oil, potatoes, onion, and bell pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are tender and lightly crisp. Season with half the salt and pepper. 3. Whisk eggs with remaining salt and pepper. 4. Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet and pour in the eggs. Scramble gently until just set. 5. Warm tortillas briefly in a dry pan. 6. Divide potatoes, eggs, sausage, cheddar, and salsa among tortillas. Roll tightly into burritos and serve hot.

Recipe Name: Veggie and Black Bean Breakfast Burritos
Description: A colorful vegetarian burrito packed with eggs, black beans, and fresh veggies.
Ingredients: 4 large flour tortillas. 6 large eggs. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained. 1 cup baby spinach, chopped. 1 cup diced red bell pepper. 1/2 cup diced red onion. 1 medium tomato, diced. 1/2 cup corn kernels, thawed if frozen. 3/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese. 1 small avocado, sliced. 1/2 cup salsa. 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/4 teaspoon chili powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat and sauté onion and bell pepper until softened. 2. Add black beans, corn, cumin, chili powder, and half the salt. Cook 2 minutes, then stir in spinach and tomato until spinach wilts. Transfer to a bowl. 3. Whisk eggs with remaining salt and pepper, then scramble in the same skillet until just set. 4. Warm tortillas in a dry pan. 5. Fill each tortilla with veggies, eggs, cheddar, avocado, and salsa. 6. Roll tightly into burritos and serve.

Recipe Name: Bacon, Avocado, and Egg Breakfast Burritos
Description: Crispy bacon, creamy avocado, and fluffy eggs wrapped in a warm tortilla with hash browns.
Ingredients: 4 large flour tortillas. 8 large eggs. 8 slices bacon. 2 cups frozen shredded hash browns. 1 tablespoon oil or butter. 3/4 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese. 1 ripe avocado, sliced. 1/2 cup salsa. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Cook bacon in a skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels and crumble. 2. In the bacon drippings cook hash browns until golden and crispy, then season with a pinch of salt and pepper. Transfer to a plate. 3. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper and scramble in the skillet with oil or butter until just set. 4. Warm tortillas in a dry pan. 5. Layer hash browns, eggs, bacon, Monterey Jack, avocado, and salsa in each tortilla. 6. Roll into burritos and serve warm.

Recipe Name: Spinach, Mushroom, and Feta Breakfast Burritos
Description: A lighter, savory burrito with garlicky mushrooms, wilted spinach, fluffy eggs, and tangy feta.
Ingredients: 4 large flour tortillas. 8 large eggs. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 3 cups sliced cremini mushrooms. 4 cups baby spinach. 1/2 cup diced onion. 1 clove garlic, minced. 3/4 cup crumbled feta cheese. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and sauté onion and mushrooms until mushrooms release moisture and brown. 2. Add garlic, oregano, and half the salt and cook 30 seconds. 3. Stir in spinach and lemon juice and cook until wilted. Transfer mixture to a bowl. 4. Whisk eggs with remaining salt and pepper, then scramble in the skillet until just set. 5. Warm tortillas. 6. Fill each tortilla with mushroom spinach mixture, eggs, and feta. 7. Roll into burritos and serve.

Recipe Name: Chorizo and Sweet Potato Breakfast Burritos
Description: A bold, smoky burrito with spicy chorizo, roasted sweet potatoes, and creamy eggs.
Ingredients: 4 large flour tortillas. 10 oz fresh Mexican chorizo. 6 large eggs. 3 cups roasted diced sweet potato. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1/2 cup diced red onion. 1 cup shredded pepper jack cheese. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro. 1 tablespoon lime juice. 2 tablespoons hot sauce, optional. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Cook chorizo in a skillet over medium heat, breaking it up, until browned and cooked through. Transfer to a bowl. 2. In the same skillet sauté red onion in olive oil until softened. 3. Add roasted sweet potato and cook until heated through and lightly crisp at the edges. 4. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper and scramble in the skillet until just set. 5. Warm tortillas. 6. Fill each tortilla with chorizo, sweet potato, eggs, pepper jack, cilantro, and lime juice. Add hot sauce if desired. 7. Roll tightly and serve.

Recipe Name: Classic Sausage, Egg and Hash Brown Breakfast Casserole
Description: A hearty baked casserole layered with crispy hash browns, savory sausage, peppers, and melted cheddar for a crowd-pleasing morning meal.
Ingredients: 1 pound breakfast sausage, casings removed. 3 cups frozen shredded hash browns, thawed and patted dry. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 small yellow onion, diced. 1 red bell pepper, diced. 8 large eggs. 1 1/2 cups milk. 1 1/2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese. 1 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Cooking spray or butter for the dish.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. 2. In a skillet over medium heat cook the sausage, breaking it into crumbles, until browned. Drain excess fat. 3. In the same skillet add olive oil, onion, and bell pepper. Sauté until softened. 4. Spread hash browns evenly in the baking dish. Top with sausage and vegetables. 5. In a bowl whisk eggs, milk, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Pour over the dish. Sprinkle cheddar on top. 6. Bake 35 to 40 minutes until the center is set and the top is golden. 7. Rest 10 minutes, then slice and serve.

Recipe Name: Mediterranean Veggie and Feta Breakfast Egg Bake
Description: A light and flavorful egg casserole packed with spinach, tomatoes, mushrooms, and tangy feta cheese.
Ingredients: 10 large eggs. 1/2 cup milk. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cups baby spinach, chopped. 1 cup mushrooms, sliced. 1 small zucchini, diced. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1/2 cup red onion, diced. 3/4 cup crumbled feta cheese. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Cooking spray for the dish.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease an 8x11 inch or similar baking dish. 2. Warm olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sauté onion and mushrooms until softened. Add zucchini and cook 2 minutes. Stir in spinach until wilted. 3. Spread the vegetables in the baking dish and scatter tomatoes and feta on top. 4. In a bowl whisk eggs, milk, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Pour over the vegetables. 5. Bake 30 to 35 minutes until set in the center. 6. Rest 5 to 10 minutes before slicing and serving.

Recipe Name: Ham and Broccoli Whole Wheat Strata
Description: A make-ahead friendly breakfast casserole with hearty whole grain bread, savory ham, tender broccoli, and melty Gruyere.
Ingredients: 8 cups whole grain bread, cut in 1 inch cubes. 2 cups diced cooked ham. 3 cups small broccoli florets, blanched. 1 1/2 cups shredded Gruyere cheese. 8 large eggs. 2 cups milk. 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard. 1/2 cup sliced scallions. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Butter for the dish.
Instructions: 1. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. Spread half the bread cubes in the dish, then half the ham, broccoli, and cheese. Repeat with remaining bread, ham, broccoli, and cheese. 2. In a bowl whisk eggs, milk, Dijon, salt, and pepper. Pour evenly over the bread mixture and press gently to submerge. 3. Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to overnight. 4. Preheat oven to 350°F. Uncover and bake 45 to 55 minutes until puffed and set with a golden top. 5. Rest 10 minutes before slicing and serving.

Recipe Name: Southwest Turkey and Black Bean Breakfast Casserole
Description: A protein-packed casserole with seasoned turkey, black beans, corn, and pepper jack for a spicy, satisfying start to the day.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 pound 93 percent lean ground turkey. 1 small yellow onion, diced. 1 red bell pepper, diced. 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed. 1 cup corn kernels. 10 large eggs. 1 cup milk. 1 cup shredded pepper jack cheese. 1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Chopped cilantro for serving, optional.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. 2. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook turkey with onion until browned, breaking it up as it cooks. Stir in bell pepper, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper and cook 2 minutes. 3. Stir in black beans and corn, then spread the mixture in the baking dish. 4. Whisk eggs and milk in a bowl and pour over the turkey mixture. Top with cheese. 5. Bake 35 to 40 minutes until the center is set. 6. Rest 10 minutes, garnish if desired, and serve.

Recipe Name: Sweet Potato and Kale Breakfast Casserole with Goat Cheese
Description: A colorful, veggie-forward casserole featuring roasted sweet potatoes, tender kale, and creamy goat cheese.
Ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and cut in 1/2 inch cubes. 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided. 1 small yellow onion, diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 4 cups chopped kale, ribs removed. 8 large eggs. 1 cup milk. 4 ounces goat cheese, crumbled. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1 teaspoon dried thyme. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Cooking spray for the dish.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. Toss sweet potato cubes with 1 tablespoon olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper and roast on a sheet pan 20 to 25 minutes until tender. Reduce oven to 350°F and grease an 8x11 inch baking dish. 2. In a skillet warm remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Sauté onion until translucent, add garlic 30 seconds, then stir in kale and cook until wilted. 3. Spread roasted sweet potatoes in the baking dish, top with kale mixture, and scatter goat cheese. 4. In a bowl whisk eggs, milk, smoked paprika, thyme, salt, and pepper. Pour over the vegetables. 5. Bake 30 to 35 minutes until set in the center. 6. Rest 10 minutes before slicing and serving.

Recipe Name: Classic Skillet Breakfast Potatoes with Peppers and Onions
Description: Golden, crispy potatoes tossed with sautéed onions and bell peppers for a hearty morning side.
Ingredients: 2 pounds russet potatoes, diced. 1 medium onion, sliced. 1 red bell pepper, sliced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 teaspoon garlic powder. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 0.5 teaspoon salt. 0.25 teaspoon black pepper. 2 tablespoons chopped parsley
Instructions: 1. Place diced potatoes in a pot of cold water and bring to a boil. Simmer 5 minutes then drain well and pat dry. 2. Heat half the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions and bell peppers and cook until softened then transfer to a bowl. 3. Add remaining oil to the skillet. Add potatoes in an even layer and cook undisturbed until browned then flip and continue until crisp and tender. 4. Sprinkle garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper over the potatoes and toss. 5. Return peppers and onions to the skillet, toss to combine, sprinkle with parsley, and serve hot.

Recipe Name: Crispy Oven Roasted Breakfast Potatoes with Garlic and Herbs
Description: Crunchy edged roasted potatoes scented with garlic, rosemary, and thyme.
Ingredients: 2 pounds yellow potatoes, cubed. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon dried rosemary. 1 teaspoon dried thyme. 0.75 teaspoon salt. 0.5 teaspoon black pepper. 1 tablespoon chopped chives
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan with parchment. 2. Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper until evenly coated. 3. Spread in a single layer on the pan. 4. Roast 25 to 35 minutes, flipping once, until crisp and golden. 5. Sprinkle with chives and serve immediately.

Recipe Name: Southwest Breakfast Potatoes with Corn and Black Beans
Description: Zesty skillet potatoes mixed with sweet corn, black beans, and warm spices.
Ingredients: 1.5 pounds potatoes, diced. 1 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained. 1 cup corn kernels. 1 small onion, diced. 1 jalapeño, minced. 2 tablespoons canola oil. 1 teaspoon chili powder. 0.5 teaspoon ground cumin. 0.5 teaspoon salt. 0.25 teaspoon black pepper. 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro. Juice of half a lime
Instructions: 1. Parboil diced potatoes in salted water for 5 minutes then drain well. 2. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat and cook potatoes until browned and crisp. 3. Add onion and jalapeño and cook until softened. 4. Stir in chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper then add corn and black beans and cook until heated through. 5. Finish with cilantro and lime juice and serve.

Recipe Name: Cheesy Skillet Breakfast Potatoes with Scallions
Description: Comforting crispy potatoes tossed with melted cheddar and fresh scallions.
Ingredients: 1.75 pounds russet potatoes, diced. 2 tablespoons butter. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese. 3 scallions, sliced. 1 teaspoon garlic powder. 0.5 teaspoon paprika. 0.75 teaspoon salt. 0.25 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Boil diced potatoes for 5 minutes then drain and dry thoroughly. 2. Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat and add potatoes in an even layer. 3. Cook until deeply golden and crisp, tossing occasionally. 4. Sprinkle garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper then add cheddar and toss until melted. 5. Fold in scallions and serve hot.

Recipe Name: Sweet Potato Breakfast Hash with Eggs
Description: A hearty sweet potato hash with peppers, onions, and soft cooked eggs.
Ingredients: 1.5 pounds sweet potatoes, diced. 1 small red bell pepper, diced. 1 small onion, diced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 4 large eggs. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 0.5 teaspoon garlic powder. 0.5 teaspoon salt. 0.25 teaspoon black pepper. 1 tablespoon chopped parsley
Instructions: 1. Heat half the oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook onions and peppers until softened then transfer to a plate. 2. Add remaining oil and sweet potatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and tender. 3. Return peppers and onions to the skillet and season with smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. 4. Make four small wells and crack an egg into each. 5. Cover and cook until eggs set to your liking, garnish with parsley, and serve.

Description: A golden, custardy breakfast favorite with warm cinnamon and vanilla.
Ingredients: 4 large eggs. 1 cup 2 percent milk. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1 tablespoon granulated sugar. Pinch of salt. 8 slices thick-cut bread. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter for cooking.
Instructions: 1. In a shallow bowl whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, sugar, and a pinch of salt until smooth. 2. Preheat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat and add 1 tablespoon butter. 3. Dip each slice of bread into the custard, letting it soak for 10 to 15 seconds per side. 4. Place soaked slices in the skillet and cook 2 to 3 minutes per side until golden and set. 5. Repeat with remaining butter and bread, adjusting heat as needed. 6. Serve warm.

Description: Fun, dunkable sticks with a crisp cinnamon sugar finish, perfect for snacking.
Ingredients: 8 slices thick bread, cut into thirds. 4 large eggs. 3/4 cup 2 percent milk. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon. 1 tablespoon granulated sugar for batter. 2 tablespoons granulated sugar plus 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon for coating. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter for cooking.
Instructions: 1. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, and 1 tablespoon sugar in a shallow dish. 2. Preheat a nonstick skillet over medium heat and melt 1 tablespoon butter. 3. Dip bread sticks quickly into the custard and place in the skillet. 4. Cook 1 to 2 minutes per side until golden, working in batches and adding remaining butter as needed. 5. Mix remaining cinnamon with sugar in a shallow dish and roll hot sticks in the mixture to coat. 6. Serve warm.

Recipe Name: Strawberry Cream Cheese Stuffed French Toast
Description: Rich and creamy stuffed slices bursting with fresh strawberries for a decadent morning treat.
Ingredients: 4 ounces cream cheese, softened. 1 tablespoon powdered sugar. 1 cup strawberries, diced. 8 slices brioche or sandwich bread. 4 large eggs. 3/4 cup 2 percent milk. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter for cooking.
Instructions: 1. In a bowl mix cream cheese with powdered sugar until smooth, then fold in strawberries. 2. Spread the mixture on 4 bread slices and top with remaining slices to form sandwiches. 3. Whisk eggs, milk, and vanilla in a shallow bowl. 4. Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat. 5. Dip each sandwich in the custard on both sides and cook 2 to 3 minutes per side until golden and warmed through. 6. Repeat with remaining butter and serve.

Recipe Name: Savory Herb and Parmesan French Toast
Description: A satisfying, cheesy twist with fresh herbs, perfect alongside tomatoes and greens for a light lunch.
Ingredients: 8 slices whole-wheat bread. 4 large eggs. 3/4 cup 2 percent milk. 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 2 tablespoons chopped chives. 1 tablespoon chopped parsley. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 1/4 teaspoon salt. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1 cup arugula.
Instructions: 1. Whisk eggs, milk, Parmesan, chives, parsley, garlic powder, pepper, and salt in a shallow bowl. 2. Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat. 3. Dip each slice of bread in the savory custard, letting excess drip off. 4. Cook 2 to 3 minutes per side until golden and set, working in batches. 5. Serve with cherry tomatoes and arugula on the side.

Description: Caramelized bananas with brown sugar and a hint of rum crown this indulgent dessert-style French toast.
Ingredients: 8 slices brioche or challah. 4 large eggs. 3/4 cup 2 percent milk. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon. Pinch of salt. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter for cooking. 2 bananas, sliced. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter for sauce. 2 tablespoons brown sugar. 1 tablespoon dark rum optional.
Instructions: 1. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt in a shallow dish. 2. Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium heat. 3. Dip bread in custard and cook 2 to 3 minutes per side until golden, then keep warm. 4. In the same skillet melt 2 tablespoons butter, add brown sugar and cook until bubbly. 5. Add banana slices and cook 1 to 2 minutes until caramelized, stirring gently. 6. If using, stir in rum and cook 30 seconds. 7. Spoon bananas and sauce over the French toast and serve.

Description: A cozy, nutty bowl of oats simmered with milk and finished with maple syrup and almond butter.
Ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats. 1 ¾ cups water. 1 cup milk. 2 tablespoons maple syrup. 2 tablespoons almond butter. 2 tablespoons sliced almonds. ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon. Pinch of salt
Instructions: 1. In a medium saucepan, combine oats, water, milk, and salt. Bring to a gentle simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally. 2. Reduce heat to low and cook 5 to 7 minutes until creamy. 3. Stir in cinnamon and almond butter until smooth. 4. Divide into bowls, drizzle with maple syrup, and top with sliced almonds. Serve warm.

Description: Warm, comforting oats studded with sweet apples, raisins, and a hint of cinnamon.
Ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats. 1 ½ cups water. ½ cup milk. 1 medium apple, diced. 2 tablespoons raisins. 1 tablespoon brown sugar. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts. Pinch of salt
Instructions: 1. Bring water, milk, and salt to a simmer in a saucepan. 2. Stir in oats and cook over low heat for 5 to 7 minutes, stirring often. 3. Fold in apple, raisins, brown sugar, and cinnamon and cook 1 to 2 minutes more until apples soften slightly. 4. Remove from heat and sprinkle with walnuts before serving.

Description: Creamy oats swirled with peanut butter and topped with banana for a protein-packed start.
Ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats. 1 cup water. 1 cup milk. 1 large banana, sliced. 2 tablespoons peanut butter. 1 tablespoon honey. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 tablespoon chia seeds. Pinch of salt
Instructions: 1. Combine oats, water, milk, and salt in a saucepan and bring to a simmer. 2. Cook over low heat 5 to 7 minutes, stirring often, until thick and creamy. 3. Stir in peanut butter, honey, vanilla, and chia seeds. 4. Fold in half the banana, then divide into bowls and top with remaining banana. Serve warm.

Recipe Name: Savory Oatmeal with Spinach, Mushrooms and Egg
Description: A hearty, savory take on oatmeal with sautéed vegetables, Parmesan, and a soft egg.
Ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats. 2 cups water. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 cup sliced mushrooms. 2 cups baby spinach. 1 clove garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon soy sauce. 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan. 2 large eggs. Pinch of salt. Black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a skillet and sauté mushrooms and garlic 3 to 4 minutes. 2. Add spinach and cook until wilted, then set aside. 3. In a saucepan, simmer oats, water, and salt 5 to 7 minutes until creamy. 4. Stir in soy sauce and Parmesan, then fold in the vegetables. 5. Cook eggs to your liking and serve them on top of the oatmeal with black pepper.

Recipe Name: Overnight Oats with Berries and Yogurt
Description: Creamy no-cook oats soaked overnight with Greek yogurt, chia, and fresh berries.
Ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats. 1 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 cup milk. 1 cup mixed berries. 2 tablespoons chia seeds. 1 tablespoon honey. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. Pinch of salt
Instructions: 1. In a bowl, stir together oats, yogurt, milk, chia seeds, honey, vanilla, and salt. 2. Fold in berries, cover, and refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. 3. Stir before serving and adjust thickness with a splash of milk if needed.

Description: Fluffy, golden pancakes with a tender crumb and classic tangy buttermilk flavor.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour. 2 tablespoons granulated sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. 1/2 teaspoon fine salt. 1 1/2 cups buttermilk. 2 large eggs. 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. Butter or oil for the pan
Instructions: 1. In a large bowl whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 2. In another bowl whisk buttermilk, eggs, melted butter, and vanilla. 3. Pour wet ingredients into dry and gently fold until just combined with a few small lumps. 4. Heat a nonstick skillet over medium and lightly grease. 5. Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake and cook until bubbles form and edges look set, then flip and cook until golden. 6. Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

Description: Wholesome, naturally sweet pancakes made with oats and ripe bananas for a hearty start.
Ingredients: 2 cups rolled oats, ground into flour or use quick oats. 2 medium ripe bananas, mashed. 2 large eggs. 1 cup milk. 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1/4 teaspoon fine salt. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 tablespoon melted coconut oil. Oil or butter for the pan
Instructions: 1. Blend or whisk oats into a coarse flour if using rolled oats. 2. In a bowl mash bananas, then whisk in eggs, milk, vanilla, and coconut oil. 3. Stir in oat flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt until just combined. 4. Heat a lightly greased skillet over medium. 5. Scoop 1/4 cup batter per pancake and cook until set and browned, then flip and finish cooking. 6. Serve warm with sliced banana or yogurt.

Description: Tender, creamy pancakes studded with blueberries and brightened with lemon zest.
Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour. 2 tablespoons granulated sugar. 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder. 1/4 teaspoon baking soda. 1/4 teaspoon fine salt. 1 cup ricotta cheese. 1/2 cup milk. 2 large eggs. 1 tablespoon lemon zest. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 cup fresh blueberries. Butter or oil for the pan
Instructions: 1. In a bowl whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 2. In another bowl whisk ricotta, milk, eggs, lemon zest, lemon juice, vanilla, and melted butter. 3. Fold wet into dry until just combined, then gently fold in blueberries. 4. Heat a greased skillet over medium. 5. Cook 1/4 cup portions until bubbles appear and edges set, flip and cook until golden. 6. Serve with a squeeze of lemon and extra berries.

Description: Indulgent, buttery pancakes dotted with melty chocolate chips for a sweet treat.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour. 2 tablespoons granulated sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. 1/2 teaspoon fine salt. 1 1/4 cups milk. 1 large egg. 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1/2 cup mini chocolate chips. Butter or oil for the pan
Instructions: 1. Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl. 2. In another bowl whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla. 3. Combine wet with dry until just mixed, then fold in chocolate chips. 4. Heat a lightly greased skillet over medium. 5. Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake and cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden. 6. Serve warm.

Description: Crispy layered Chinese style pancakes with fragrant scallions and toasted sesame oil.
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour. 3/4 cup boiling water. 1/4 cup cold water. 1 teaspoon fine salt. 1/4 teaspoon white pepper. 2 tablespoons sesame oil. 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, plus more for cooking. 1 cup thinly sliced scallions
Instructions: 1. In a bowl mix flour and salt, then stir in boiling water until clumpy. Add cold water and knead into a smooth dough. Cover and rest 30 minutes. 2. Divide dough into 4 pieces. Roll one piece thin, brush with sesame oil, sprinkle scallions and white pepper, roll into a log and coil into a spiral, then roll flat. Repeat. 3. Heat a thin layer of oil in a skillet over medium. 4. Cook each pancake 2 to 3 minutes per side until blistered and crisp, adding oil as needed. 5. Cut into wedges and serve hot.

Description: A crisp, fluffy waffle with a tangy buttermilk richness that’s perfect for maple syrup or fresh fruit.
Ingredients: 1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour. 2 tablespoons sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. ½ teaspoon baking soda. ½ teaspoon salt. 2 large eggs. 1 ¾ cups buttermilk. ⅓ cup unsalted butter, melted. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract.
Instructions: 1. Preheat waffle iron. 2. In a bowl whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 3. In another bowl whisk eggs, buttermilk, melted butter, and vanilla. 4. Pour wet into dry and whisk just until combined. 5. Lightly grease the iron and cook batter in batches until golden and crisp.

Description: Hearty, lightly sweet waffles studded with banana and crunchy walnuts for a wholesome start to the day.
Ingredients: 1 ½ cups whole wheat flour. 2 tablespoons brown sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon. ¼ teaspoon salt. 2 ripe bananas, mashed. 2 large eggs. 1 ¼ cups milk. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. ⅓ cup chopped walnuts.
Instructions: 1. Preheat waffle iron. 2. Whisk flour, brown sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. 3. In another bowl whisk bananas, eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla. 4. Combine wet with dry just until no dry streaks remain, then fold in walnuts. 5. Cook in a greased waffle iron until set and browned.

Description: Bright, tender waffles dotted with juicy blueberries and fragrant lemon zest.
Ingredients: 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour. 2 tablespoons sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. ¼ teaspoon salt. 2 large eggs. 1 ¼ cups milk. 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 tablespoon finely grated lemon zest. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 cup fresh blueberries.
Instructions: 1. Preheat waffle iron. 2. Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. 3. In another bowl whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, vanilla, lemon zest, and lemon juice. 4. Stir wet into dry just to combine, then gently fold in blueberries. 5. Cook in a lightly greased waffle iron until golden.

Description: Crispy-edged, cheesy waffles with chives that pair well with eggs, salad, or soup.
Ingredients: 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour. 1 tablespoon sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. ½ teaspoon baking soda. ½ teaspoon salt. 2 large eggs. 1 ¼ cups buttermilk. 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese. 2 tablespoons chopped chives. ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper.
Instructions: 1. Preheat waffle iron. 2. Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and pepper. 3. In another bowl whisk eggs, buttermilk, and melted butter. 4. Combine wet with dry just until mixed, then fold in cheddar and chives. 5. Cook in a greased waffle iron until deeply golden and crisp.

Recipe Name: Chocolate Chip Waffles with Strawberries and Whipped Cream
Description: A decadent waffle studded with chocolate chips and finished with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.
Ingredients: 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour. 3 tablespoons sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. ¼ teaspoon salt. 2 large eggs. 1 ¼ cups milk. 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. ½ cup mini chocolate chips. 1 cup sliced strawberries. ½ cup whipped cream.
Instructions: 1. Preheat waffle iron. 2. Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 3. In another bowl whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla. 4. Stir wet into dry just until combined, then fold in chocolate chips. 5. Cook waffles and serve topped with strawberries and whipped cream.

Recipe Name: Classic Egg and Cheese English Muffin Sandwich
Description: A simple, satisfying breakfast sandwich with fluffy eggs, melted cheddar, and fresh veggies on a toasty whole wheat English muffin.
Ingredients: 2 whole wheat English muffins, split and toasted. 4 large eggs. 2 slices cheddar cheese. 2 teaspoons butter. 1 small tomato, sliced. 1 cup baby spinach. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Toast the English muffins. 2. Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. 3. Beat the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper, then scramble until just set. 4. Layer spinach and tomato on the muffin bottoms. 5. Divide the scrambled eggs on top and add a slice of cheddar to each. 6. Cover the pan briefly to melt the cheese, cap with muffin tops, and serve warm.

Recipe Name: Bacon, Egg and Avocado Breakfast Sandwich
Description: Crispy bacon, creamy avocado, and a tender fried egg stacked between hearty whole grain toast.
Ingredients: 4 slices whole grain bread, toasted. 4 slices bacon. 2 large eggs. 1 small avocado, sliced. 2 teaspoons mayonnaise. 4 tomato slices. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Cook the bacon in a skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels. 2. In the same skillet, fry the eggs to desired doneness. 3. Spread mayonnaise on the toasted bread slices. 4. Layer avocado and tomato on two slices, add bacon and an egg to each. 5. Season with salt and pepper, top with remaining bread, slice, and serve.

Recipe Name: Veggie and Hummus Pita Breakfast Sandwich
Description: A fresh, fiber-rich vegetarian breakfast sandwich with creamy hummus and crisp vegetables in warm whole wheat pita pockets.
Ingredients: 2 whole wheat pitas, warmed. 6 tablespoons hummus. 1 small cucumber, thinly sliced. 1 medium tomato, sliced. 2 cups baby spinach. 1/4 small red onion, thinly sliced. 2 teaspoons lemon juice. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Warm the pitas and carefully open to form pockets. 2. Spread half the hummus inside each pita. 3. Toss cucumber, tomato, spinach, and red onion with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 4. Stuff the pitas evenly with the salad. 5. Serve immediately.

Recipe Name: Turkey Sausage, Egg and Swiss Bagel Thin Sandwich
Description: A protein-packed sandwich with savory turkey sausage, a soft-cooked egg, and melty Swiss on a toasty whole wheat bagel thin.
Ingredients: 2 whole wheat bagel thins, split and toasted. 2 turkey sausage patties. 2 large eggs. 2 slices Swiss cheese. 2 teaspoons olive oil. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Cook turkey sausage in a skillet over medium heat until browned and cooked through. 2. Transfer sausage to a plate and wipe the skillet. 3. Add olive oil and fry the eggs to desired doneness, seasoning with salt and pepper. 4. Place sausage and a slice of Swiss on each bagel bottom. 5. Add the egg, cover briefly to melt the cheese, cap with bagel tops, and serve.

Recipe Name: Smoked Salmon and Egg Bagel Breakfast Sandwich
Description: A deli-style bagel layered with light cream cheese, soft scrambled egg, silky smoked salmon, and bright capers and dill.
Ingredients: 2 plain bagels, split and toasted. 4 ounces smoked salmon. 4 tablespoons light cream cheese. 2 large eggs. 2 tablespoons thinly sliced red onion. 2 teaspoons capers, rinsed. 2 teaspoons lemon juice. Fresh dill. Black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Soft-scramble the eggs in a nonstick skillet over low heat until creamy. 2. Spread cream cheese on cut sides of the toasted bagels. 3. Divide the scrambled eggs and smoked salmon between the bagel bottoms. 4. Top with red onion, capers, lemon juice, dill, and black pepper. 5. Close with bagel tops and serve.

Description: A timeless brunch favorite with toasted English muffins, Canadian bacon, poached eggs, and silky hollandaise sauce.
Ingredients: 4 English muffins, split and toasted. 8 large eggs. 8 slices Canadian bacon. 1 tablespoon white vinegar. Salt and black pepper to taste. ¾ cup unsalted butter, melted and warm. 4 large egg yolks. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 tablespoon water. Pinch cayenne. Chopped chives for garnish.
Instructions: 1. Make the hollandaise. In a heatproof bowl whisk egg yolks, lemon juice and water until slightly thickened. 2. Place over a pot of barely simmering water, whisking constantly, and slowly drizzle in the warm melted butter until thick and glossy. Season with salt, pepper and cayenne. Keep warm. 3. Sear the Canadian bacon in a skillet over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes per side. 4. Bring a wide saucepan of water to a bare simmer and add vinegar. 5. Crack each egg into a small cup, create a gentle whirlpool, and slide in the eggs one at a time. Poach 3 to 4 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain. 6. Toast the English muffins if needed. 7. Assemble by topping each muffin half with bacon, a poached egg and a generous spoonful of hollandaise. 8. Garnish with chives and serve immediately.

Description: A luxurious twist featuring silky smoked salmon, poached eggs, and dill-studded hollandaise on toasted muffins.
Ingredients: 4 English muffins, split and toasted. 8 large eggs. 8 ounces smoked salmon, sliced. 1 tablespoon white vinegar. Salt and black pepper to taste. ¾ cup unsalted butter, melted and warm. 4 large egg yolks. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 tablespoon water. 1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill. Pinch cayenne. Lemon wedges for serving.
Instructions: 1. Make the hollandaise by whisking yolks, lemon juice and water in a heatproof bowl. 2. Set over barely simmering water and slowly stream in warm melted butter, whisking until thick. Stir in dill, cayenne, salt and pepper. Keep warm. 3. Bring a wide pan of water to a bare simmer and add vinegar. 4. Poach the eggs 3 to 4 minutes and drain on paper towels. 5. Arrange smoked salmon on each toasted muffin half. 6. Top with a poached egg and spoon over hollandaise. 7. Finish with extra dill and a squeeze of lemon if desired. 8. Serve immediately.

Description: A fresh, meatless version layered with creamy avocado and ripe tomato under a bright, lemony hollandaise.
Ingredients: 4 English muffins, split and toasted. 8 large eggs. 2 ripe avocados, sliced. 2 medium tomatoes, sliced. 1 tablespoon white vinegar. Salt and black pepper to taste. ½ cup unsalted butter, melted and warm. 3 large egg yolks. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 tablespoon water. Pinch cayenne. Chopped cilantro or chives for garnish.
Instructions: 1. Make a lighter hollandaise. Whisk yolks, lemon juice and water in a heatproof bowl. 2. Set over barely simmering water and slowly whisk in the warm melted butter until just thickened. Season with salt, pepper and cayenne. Keep warm. 3. Bring a wide saucepan of water to a bare simmer and add vinegar. 4. Poach eggs 3 to 4 minutes and drain. 5. Layer avocado and tomato on each toasted muffin half and season lightly with salt and pepper. 6. Top with a poached egg and spoon over hollandaise. 7. Garnish with herbs. 8. Serve immediately.

Description: A vegetarian classic with garlicky sautéed spinach under poached eggs and velvety hollandaise.
Ingredients: 4 English muffins, split and toasted. 8 large eggs. 8 cups fresh spinach. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 small garlic clove, minced. 1 tablespoon white vinegar. Salt and black pepper to taste. ¾ cup unsalted butter, melted and warm. 4 large egg yolks. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 tablespoon water. Pinch nutmeg. Pinch cayenne.
Instructions: 1. Warm the butter for the hollandaise. In a heatproof bowl whisk yolks, lemon juice and water. 2. Set over barely simmering water and slowly whisk in warm butter until thick. Season with salt, pepper, nutmeg and cayenne. Keep warm. 3. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Sauté garlic for 30 seconds, add spinach and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Bring a wide pan of water to a bare simmer and add vinegar. 5. Poach eggs 3 to 4 minutes and drain. 6. Place spinach on each toasted muffin half. 7. Top with a poached egg and spoon over hollandaise. 8. Serve immediately.

Description: A bold and savory variation with spiced chorizo, poached eggs, and rich hollandaise on toasted muffins.
Ingredients: 4 English muffins, split and toasted. 8 large eggs. 8 ounces fresh chorizo sausage, casings removed. 1 tablespoon white vinegar. Salt and black pepper to taste. ¾ cup unsalted butter, melted and warm. 4 large egg yolks. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 tablespoon water. Pinch cayenne. Chopped cilantro for garnish.
Instructions: 1. Brown the chorizo in a skillet over medium heat, breaking it into crumbles, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain excess fat and keep warm. 2. Make the hollandaise by whisking yolks, lemon juice and water in a heatproof bowl over barely simmering water, then slowly whisk in warm melted butter until thick. Season with salt, pepper and cayenne. Keep warm. 3. Bring a wide saucepan of water to a bare simmer and add vinegar. 4. Poach eggs 3 to 4 minutes and drain. 5. Arrange chorizo on each toasted muffin half. 6. Top with a poached egg and spoon over hollandaise. 7. Garnish with cilantro. 8. Serve immediately.

Description: A crunchy, lightly sweet granola with toasted pecans and warm cinnamon perfect for breakfast or snacking.
Ingredients: 3 cups old fashioned rolled oats. 1 cup chopped pecans. 1/2 cup dried cranberries. 1/3 cup pure maple syrup. 1/4 cup melted coconut oil. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 F and line a large baking sheet with parchment. 2. In a large bowl combine oats, pecans, cinnamon, and salt. 3. Whisk maple syrup, melted coconut oil, and vanilla until smooth. 4. Pour over the oat mixture and stir until evenly coated. 5. Spread in an even layer and bake 22 to 28 minutes, stirring once halfway, until golden. 6. Cool completely, then fold in dried cranberries and store in an airtight jar.

Description: A rich cocoa granola with almonds, toasted coconut, and chocolate chips for a dessert like breakfast.
Ingredients: 3 cups old fashioned rolled oats. 1 cup sliced almonds. 1/2 cup unsweetened shredded coconut. 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder. 1/3 cup honey. 1/4 cup melted coconut oil. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt. 1/2 cup dark chocolate chips
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 F and line a baking sheet with parchment. 2. Mix oats, almonds, shredded coconut, cocoa powder, and salt in a large bowl. 3. Whisk honey, melted coconut oil, and vanilla until smooth. 4. Toss dry with wet until fully coated. 5. Bake 24 to 30 minutes, stirring once, until fragrant and crisp. 6. Cool completely, then stir in chocolate chips.

Description: A sunny granola with coconut, macadamias, dried mango, and pineapple brightened with lime.
Ingredients: 3 cups old fashioned rolled oats. 1/2 cup chopped macadamia nuts. 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut flakes. 1/3 cup honey. 3 tablespoons melted coconut oil. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 teaspoon finely grated lime zest. 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt. 1/2 cup chopped dried mango. 1/2 cup chopped dried pineapple
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 F and line a baking sheet with parchment. 2. Combine oats, macadamias, coconut flakes, lime zest, and salt in a large bowl. 3. Whisk honey, melted coconut oil, and vanilla. 4. Pour over the dry mixture and stir to coat evenly. 5. Bake 22 to 28 minutes, stirring once, until lightly browned. 6. Cool completely, then fold in dried mango and pineapple.

Description: A hearty clustery granola flavored with creamy peanut butter and real banana.
Ingredients: 3 cups old fashioned rolled oats. 3/4 cup chopped roasted peanuts unsalted. 1 cup mashed ripe banana about 2 medium. 1/3 cup creamy peanut butter. 2 tablespoons honey. 2 tablespoons melted coconut oil. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt. 1/2 cup banana chips optional
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 F and line a large baking sheet with parchment. 2. In a bowl mix oats, peanuts, cinnamon, and salt. 3. In another bowl mash banana and whisk with peanut butter, honey, melted coconut oil, and vanilla until smooth. 4. Combine wet with dry and stir until evenly coated. 5. Spread in an even layer and bake 30 to 35 minutes, stirring and flipping clumps twice, until dry and crisp. 6. Cool completely, then fold in banana chips if using.

Recipe Name: Nut Free Seed and Berry Granola
Description: A crunchy nut free granola packed with seeds and dried blueberries for an energizing start to the day.
Ingredients: 3 cups old fashioned rolled oats. 1/3 cup pure maple syrup. 3 tablespoons olive oil or melted coconut oil. 1/2 cup sunflower seeds. 1/2 cup pumpkin seeds. 2 tablespoons chia seeds. 2 tablespoons ground flaxseed. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt. 1/2 cup dried blueberries
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 F and line a baking sheet with parchment. 2. Combine oats, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, chia seeds, flaxseed, cinnamon, and salt. 3. Whisk maple syrup, oil, and vanilla. 4. Toss to coat evenly and spread on the sheet. 5. Bake 22 to 28 minutes, stirring once, until golden and crisp. 6. Cool completely, then fold in dried blueberries.

Description: Hearty, lightly sweet muffins packed with oats and juicy blueberries for a wholesome start to the day.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups rolled oats. 1 cup whole wheat flour. 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. 1/2 cup brown sugar. 2 teaspoons baking powder. 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. 1/2 teaspoon fine salt. 1 cup milk. 1/3 cup melted coconut oil or neutral oil. 2 large eggs. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 cup blueberries, fresh or frozen. 1 tablespoon lemon zest optional
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F and line a 12-cup muffin tin with liners. 2. In a bowl combine oats and milk and let sit 10 minutes to soften. 3. In a large bowl whisk flours, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 4. Whisk eggs, oil, vanilla, and the soaked oats and milk until combined. 5. Fold wet mixture into dry just until combined, then gently fold in blueberries and lemon zest. 6. Divide batter among cups and bake 18 to 20 minutes until a tester comes out clean. 7. Cool in pan 5 minutes, then transfer to a rack to cool completely

Description: Moist, nutty muffins naturally sweetened with ripe bananas and warm spices for an energizing morning bite.
Ingredients: 3 ripe bananas, mashed. 1/3 cup melted butter or neutral oil. 1/2 cup brown sugar. 2 large eggs. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 3/4 cups whole wheat flour. 1 teaspoon baking soda. 1 teaspoon baking powder. 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1/4 teaspoon fine salt. 1/3 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1/4 cup milk. 1/2 cup chopped walnuts
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F and line a 12-cup muffin tin. 2. In a large bowl whisk mashed bananas, melted butter or oil, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, yogurt, and milk. 3. In another bowl whisk flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt. 4. Fold dry ingredients into wet just until combined. 5. Stir in walnuts. 6. Portion into muffin cups and bake 18 to 22 minutes until golden and set. 7. Cool 10 minutes before serving

Description: Savory, protein-rich egg muffins with spinach, peppers, and tangy feta for easy grab-and-go breakfasts.
Ingredients: 8 large eggs. 1/2 cup milk. 1 cup fresh spinach, chopped. 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese. 1/2 cup red bell pepper, diced. 1/4 cup green onion, chopped. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 1/4 teaspoon fine salt. Oil for greasing
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F and lightly grease a 12-cup muffin tin. 2. In a large bowl whisk eggs and milk until smooth. 3. Stir in spinach, feta, bell pepper, green onion, garlic powder, pepper, and salt. 4. Divide mixture evenly among cups. 5. Bake 18 to 20 minutes until set at the center. 6. Cool 5 minutes, then run a knife around edges to release

Description: Tender muffins scented with cinnamon and packed with juicy apple, balanced by tangy Greek yogurt.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour. 1/2 cup whole wheat flour. 1 teaspoon baking powder. 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg. 1/4 teaspoon fine salt. 1/2 cup granulated sugar. 2 large eggs. 1 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1/4 cup milk. 1/3 cup melted coconut oil. 1 1/2 cups peeled apple, diced
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F and line a 12-cup muffin tin. 2. In a bowl whisk flours, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and sugar. 3. In another bowl whisk eggs, yogurt, milk, and melted coconut oil. 4. Fold wet ingredients into dry just until combined, then fold in diced apple. 5. Spoon into muffin cups and bake 18 to 20 minutes until a tester comes out clean. 6. Cool in pan 5 minutes, then transfer to a rack

Description: Veggie-studded muffins with carrots, zucchini, raisins, and nuts for a hearty, lightly sweet breakfast.
Ingredients: 1 cup whole wheat flour. 3/4 cup all-purpose flour. 1/2 cup rolled oats. 1/2 cup brown sugar. 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder. 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger. 1/4 teaspoon fine salt. 2 large eggs. 1/3 cup olive oil. 1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1 cup grated carrot. 1 cup grated zucchini, squeezed dry. 1/3 cup raisins. 1/3 cup chopped pecans
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F and line a 12-cup muffin tin. 2. In a large bowl whisk flours, oats, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, ginger, and salt. 3. In another bowl whisk eggs, olive oil, applesauce, and vanilla. 4. Fold wet ingredients into dry just until combined. 5. Stir in carrot, zucchini, raisins, and pecans. 6. Divide batter into cups and bake 20 to 22 minutes until tops spring back. 7. Cool 10 minutes before serving

Description: A bright and creamy layered parfait with tangy yogurt, fresh berries, and crunchy granola.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups plain nonfat Greek yogurt. 1 1/2 cups mixed berries, such as strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries. 1/2 cup granola. 2 teaspoons honey. 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
Instructions: 1. In a small bowl stir the yogurt with vanilla until smooth. 2. Divide one third of the berries between two glasses. 3. Spoon in half the yogurt, then add half the granola and a light drizzle of honey. 4. Repeat the layers with remaining berries and yogurt, then top with remaining granola. 5. Drizzle any remaining honey over the top and serve immediately.

Description: A sunny layered parfait featuring sweet mango, pineapple, creamy yogurt, and a hint of toasted coconut and lime.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups plain nonfat Greek yogurt. 1 cup diced ripe mango. 1/2 cup pineapple tidbits. 2 tablespoons unsweetened toasted coconut flakes. 2 teaspoons fresh lime juice. 2 teaspoons honey. 1/4 cup granola
Instructions: 1. Stir the yogurt with lime juice until combined. 2. Arrange a layer of mango and pineapple in two glasses. 3. Add a layer of yogurt, then sprinkle with granola and coconut. 4. Repeat the layers with remaining fruit and yogurt. 5. Finish with remaining coconut and a drizzle of honey and serve.

Recipe Name: Chocolate Banana Peanut Butter Yogurt Parfait
Description: A dessert inspired parfait with rich cocoa, creamy peanut butter, bananas, and high protein yogurt.
Ingredients: 1 1/3 cups plain nonfat Greek yogurt. 1 medium banana, sliced. 2 tablespoons natural unsweetened peanut butter. 2 teaspoons unsweetened cocoa powder. 2 teaspoons maple syrup. 2 tablespoons cacao nibs
Instructions: 1. In a bowl whisk yogurt with cocoa until smooth. 2. Divide half the banana slices between two glasses. 3. Layer with half the cocoa yogurt, then dollop peanut butter and sprinkle cacao nibs. 4. Repeat the layers with remaining banana, yogurt, and cacao nibs. 5. Drizzle with maple syrup and serve.

Description: A cozy parfait with crunchy apples, warm cinnamon, raisins, and toasted walnuts for satisfying texture.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups plain nonfat Greek yogurt. 1 1/2 cups diced apple. 4 tablespoons chopped walnuts. 2 tablespoons raisins. 2 teaspoons maple syrup. 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon. 2 teaspoons lemon juice
Instructions: 1. Toss diced apple with lemon juice and cinnamon in a bowl. 2. Spoon a layer of the apple mixture into two glasses. 3. Add a layer of yogurt, then sprinkle with walnuts and raisins. 4. Repeat layers with remaining apple, yogurt, walnuts, and raisins. 5. Drizzle maple syrup on top and serve.

Description: A bold and refreshing parfait with cocoa and espresso kissed yogurt, juicy berries, almonds, and dark chocolate.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups plain nonfat Greek yogurt. 1 1/2 cups mixed berries. 2 teaspoons unsweetened cocoa powder. 1 teaspoon instant espresso powder. 2 teaspoons maple syrup. 2 tablespoons sliced almonds. 2 teaspoons dark chocolate shavings
Instructions: 1. Stir yogurt with cocoa and espresso powder until smooth. 2. Place a layer of berries in two glasses. 3. Spoon in half the mocha yogurt and sprinkle almonds. 4. Repeat with remaining berries and yogurt. 5. Top with dark chocolate shavings, drizzle with maple syrup, and serve.

Description: A classic Italian antipasto of toasted bread topped with juicy tomato, garlic, and basil.
Ingredients: 1 baguette, sliced into 12 rounds. 4 medium ripe tomatoes, seeded and diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. ¼ cup fresh basil, chopped. 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil. 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Brush baguette slices with 1 tablespoon oil and place on a baking sheet. Toast 8 to 10 minutes until crisp and lightly golden. 3. In a bowl, combine tomatoes, garlic, basil, remaining oil, balsamic, salt, and pepper. 4. Spoon tomato mixture over warm toasts. 5. Serve immediately.

Description: Bite-size skewers of tomato, mozzarella, and basil with a drizzle of olive oil and balsamic.
Ingredients: 24 cherry tomatoes. 24 small fresh mozzarella balls, drained. 24 fresh basil leaves. 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil. 2 tablespoons balsamic glaze. Salt and black pepper to taste. Small skewers.
Instructions: 1. Thread a tomato, a basil leaf, and a mozzarella ball onto each skewer. 2. Arrange on a platter. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze. 4. Season lightly with salt and pepper and serve.

Description: Briny olives gently warmed with citrus, garlic, and herbs for a fragrant nibble.
Ingredients: 3 cups mixed olives, drained. 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil. Zest of 1 lemon and 1 orange, plus wide strips of peel. 2 cloves garlic, smashed. 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes. 2 sprigs fresh rosemary. 4 sprigs fresh thyme. Freshly ground black pepper.
Instructions: 1. In a small pan over low heat, warm olive oil with citrus zests and peels, garlic, red pepper flakes, rosemary, and thyme for 3 to 4 minutes until fragrant. 2. Stir in olives and warm gently for 2 to 3 minutes. 3. Remove from heat and let marinate 30 minutes. 4. Season with black pepper and serve warm or at room temperature.

Description: Sweet cantaloupe paired with silky prosciutto and fresh mint.
Ingredients: 1 large ripe cantaloupe, peeled and sliced into wedges. 12 thin slices prosciutto. 2 tablespoons fresh mint, finely chopped.
Instructions: 1. Cut the cantaloupe into 12 wedges. 2. Wrap each wedge with a slice of prosciutto. 3. Arrange on a platter and sprinkle with mint. 4. Chill briefly if desired and serve.

Recipe Name: Grilled Eggplant Rolls with Herbed Goat Cheese
Description: Tender grilled eggplant wrapped around a bright, creamy goat cheese filling.
Ingredients: 2 medium eggplants, sliced lengthwise ¼ inch thick. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 6 ounces goat cheese, softened. 1 teaspoon lemon zest. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped. 1 tablespoon fresh chives, chopped. 1 small garlic clove, grated. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Brush eggplant slices with 2 tablespoons oil and season with salt and pepper. 2. Grill over medium-high heat 2 to 3 minutes per side until tender with grill marks. 3. Mix goat cheese with remaining oil, lemon zest, parsley, chives, and garlic. 4. Spread cheese mixture on one end of each slice and roll up. 5. Return rolls to the grill for 1 minute to warm through and serve.

Recipe Name: Garlic Herb Yogurt Dip with Veggie Sticks
Description: A cool, creamy dip paired with crisp fresh vegetables for a light, protein-rich snack.
Ingredients: 1 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 small garlic clove, minced. 2 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped. 1 tablespoon fresh chives, chopped. 1/4 teaspoon salt. 1/8 teaspoon black pepper. 2 medium carrots, cut into sticks. 1 medium cucumber, cut into sticks. 1 medium red bell pepper, sliced.
Instructions: 1. In a bowl, whisk the yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dill, chives, salt, and pepper until smooth. 2. Arrange the carrot, cucumber, and bell pepper sticks on a platter. 3. Spoon the dip into a serving bowl and place in the center. 4. Chill for 15 minutes to allow flavors to meld if time allows. 5. Garnish with extra herbs and serve.

Description: Oven-baked fries with a smoky paprika kick and a tender interior.
Ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into fries. 1 tablespoon cornstarch. 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 teaspoon paprika. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 F and line a baking sheet with parchment. 2. Toss fries with cornstarch, then add olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper and toss to coat. 3. Spread in a single layer on the sheet. 4. Bake 25 to 30 minutes, flipping halfway, until crisp and golden. 5. Serve hot.

Description: Bite-size skewers of tomato, basil, and mozzarella finished with a sweet tangy drizzle.
Ingredients: 24 cherry tomatoes. 200 g mini mozzarella balls, drained. 24 fresh basil leaves. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar. 1 teaspoon honey. Pinch salt and black pepper. 12 small skewers.
Instructions: 1. Thread a tomato, a basil leaf, and a mozzarella ball onto each skewer and repeat to fill. 2. In a small bowl whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, salt, and pepper. 3. Arrange skewers on a platter. 4. Drizzle the dressing over the skewers just before serving. 5. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

Description: Crunchy, savory roasted chickpeas perfect for nibbling or topping salads.
Ingredients: 2 cans chickpeas, rinsed and thoroughly dried. 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 F and line a baking sheet. 2. Toss dried chickpeas with olive oil, paprika, cumin, cayenne, garlic powder, and salt. 3. Spread in an even layer on the sheet. 4. Roast 25 to 35 minutes, shaking the pan a few times, until crisp. 5. Cool slightly before serving.

Recipe Name: Avocado Toast Bites with Cherry Tomatoes
Description: Creamy avocado on whole-grain toast topped with bright tomatoes and herbs.
Ingredients: 8 slices whole-grain bread, toasted and cut in halves. 2 ripe avocados. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1/4 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, quartered. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley.
Instructions: 1. In a bowl mash avocados with lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 2. Spread the avocado mixture over the toast halves. 3. Top with cherry tomatoes and parsley. 4. Cut into bite-size squares if needed. 5. Serve immediately.

Description: A juicy, classic beef burger with melty cheddar, crisp veggies, and tangy condiments on a toasted bun.
Ingredients: 1 lb 80/20 ground beef. 1 teaspoon kosher salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 4 brioche burger buns. 4 slices cheddar cheese. 4 leaves lettuce. 1 large tomato, sliced. 1/2 small red onion, thinly sliced. 8 dill pickle slices. 4 tablespoons ketchup. 4 teaspoons yellow mustard. 2 teaspoons neutral oil
Instructions: 1. Divide beef into 4 equal balls and gently form into 4 inch wide patties with a slight dimple in the center. 2. Season both sides with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. 3. Heat a skillet or grill over medium high, add oil, and cook patties 3 to 4 minutes per side until browned and cooked to your desired doneness. 4. Top each patty with a cheese slice during the last minute to melt. 5. Lightly toast buns. 6. Build burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, ketchup, and mustard, then serve hot.

Description: A lighter, flavor packed turkey burger topped with creamy avocado and fresh veggies on whole wheat buns.
Ingredients: 1 lb ground turkey 93 percent lean. 1 teaspoon kosher salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1 teaspoon garlic powder. 1 teaspoon lime juice. 1 teaspoon olive oil. 4 whole wheat burger buns. 1 medium avocado, sliced. 1 large tomato, sliced. 4 leaves lettuce. 4 thin slices red onion
Instructions: 1. In a bowl mix turkey with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder, then form 4 equal patties. 2. Heat a skillet over medium heat, add the olive oil, and cook patties 4 to 5 minutes per side until cooked through. 3. Lightly toast buns. 4. Assemble burgers with avocado, tomato, lettuce, onion, and a squeeze of lime juice. 5. Serve immediately.

Description: Hearty and smoky plant based burgers made with black beans and topped with tangy barbecue sauce and crunchy slaw.
Ingredients: 2 cans black beans, drained and rinsed. 1 cup breadcrumbs. 1 large egg. 1/2 cup finely chopped onion. 2 garlic cloves, minced. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt. 1/4 cup barbecue sauce, plus more for serving. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 4 whole wheat burger buns. 1 cup coleslaw mix
Instructions: 1. Mash beans in a large bowl until mostly smooth with some chunks. 2. Stir in breadcrumbs, egg, onion, garlic, paprika, cumin, salt, and 2 tablespoons barbecue sauce until combined. 3. Form 4 patties and chill 10 minutes if time allows. 4. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook patties 3 to 4 minutes per side until browned and heated through. 5. Toast buns, spread with remaining barbecue sauce, add patties, and top with slaw, then serve.

Recipe Name: Salmon Burger with Dill Yogurt Sauce
Description: Fresh salmon patties seared until golden and served with a bright dill yogurt sauce on wholesome buns.
Ingredients: 1 lb skinless salmon, finely chopped. 1/2 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1 large egg. 1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill. 1 teaspoon lemon zest. 1 small garlic clove, minced. 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill for sauce. 4 whole wheat burger buns. Lettuce and cucumber slices for serving
Instructions: 1. In a bowl combine salmon, panko, egg, dill, lemon zest, garlic, salt, and pepper, then form 4 patties. 2. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook patties 3 to 4 minutes per side until cooked through. 3. In a small bowl mix yogurt, lemon juice, and dill to make the sauce. 4. Lightly toast buns. 5. Spread buns with yogurt sauce, add salmon patties, lettuce, and cucumber, then serve.

Description: A savory vegetarian burger featuring balsamic marinated portobello caps, melty mozzarella, and basil pesto on ciabatta.
Ingredients: 4 large portobello mushroom caps, stems removed. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar. 1 small garlic clove, minced. 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 4 ciabatta rolls. 4 slices fresh mozzarella 28 g each. 4 tablespoons basil pesto. 1 large tomato, sliced. 2 cups arugula
Instructions: 1. Whisk olive oil, balsamic, garlic, salt, and pepper, then brush over mushroom caps. 2. Grill or pan sear mushrooms over medium heat 4 to 5 minutes per side until tender. 3. Top each cap with a mozzarella slice during the last minute to warm and soften. 4. Warm or toast ciabatta rolls. 5. Spread pesto on rolls, add mushrooms, tomato, and arugula, then serve.

Description: A bright and fresh chicken salad with crisp vegetables and a zesty lemon herb dressing.
Ingredients: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. Salt and pepper to taste. 6 cups mixed salad greens. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1 medium cucumber, sliced. 1/4 small red onion, thinly sliced. 1/4 cup crumbled feta. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
Instructions: 1. In a bowl combine chicken, olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Marinate 15 to 30 minutes. 2. Heat a grill pan over medium high heat and cook chicken 4 to 6 minutes per side until cooked through. Rest 5 minutes, then slice. 3. In a large bowl add mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion. 4. In a small bowl whisk olive oil, red wine vinegar, Dijon, salt, and pepper. 5. Recipe Name: Greek Chicken Salad with Yogurt Dill Dressing
Description: A protein packed Greek style salad with juicy chicken, olives, and a creamy yogurt herb dressing.
Ingredients: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. Salt and pepper to taste. 6 cups chopped romaine lettuce. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1 medium cucumber, diced. 1/2 cup Kalamata olives, pitted and halved. 1/4 cup red onion, thinly sliced. 1/3 cup crumbled feta. 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon olive oil. 1 teaspoon dried dill. 1 small garlic clove, minced. Pinch of salt and pepper
Instructions: 1. Toss chicken with olive oil, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper, then grill or pan cook over medium high heat 4 to 6 minutes per side until done. Rest and slice. 2. In a large bowl combine romaine, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and red onion. 3. In a small bowl whisk yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, dill, garlic, salt, and pepper until smooth. 4. Add sliced chicken and feta to the salad base. 5. Drizzle with yogurt dressing and toss to coat. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

Recipe Name: Thai Chicken Salad with Peanut Lime Dressing
Description: A crunchy, colorful salad with savory grilled chicken and a creamy peanut lime dressing.
Ingredients: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Pinch of salt. 4 cups shredded green cabbage. 1 cup shredded carrot. 1 medium red bell pepper, thinly sliced. 2 green onions, sliced. 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro. 3 tablespoons creamy peanut butter. 1 tablespoon soy sauce. 1 tablespoon honey. 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice. 1 teaspoon sesame oil. 1 tablespoon water
Instructions: 1. Rub chicken with olive oil, garlic powder, pepper, and salt, then grill or pan cook over medium heat 4 to 6 minutes per side until cooked through. Rest and slice thinly. 2. In a large bowl combine cabbage, carrot, bell pepper, green onions, and cilantro. 3. In a small bowl whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, lime juice, sesame oil, and water until smooth, adding a little more water if needed. 4. Add sliced chicken to the vegetables. 5. Pour over the peanut dressing and toss until evenly coated. Serve immediately.

Recipe Name: Southwest Chicken Salad with Black Beans and Corn
Description: A hearty salad layered with spiced chicken, creamy avocado, black beans, and sweet corn.
Ingredients: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/2 teaspoon chili powder. Salt and pepper to taste. 6 cups chopped romaine lettuce. 1 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained. 1 cup corn kernels, fresh or thawed. 1 medium avocado, diced. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1/4 small red onion, thinly sliced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons lime juice. 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro
Instructions: 1. Rub chicken with olive oil, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper, then grill or pan cook 4 to 6 minutes per side until done. Rest and slice. 2. In a large bowl combine romaine, black beans, corn, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. 3. Whisk olive oil, lime juice, cilantro, salt, and pepper for the dressing. 4. Add sliced chicken to the bowl. 5. Drizzle with dressing and toss gently to combine. Serve right away.

Recipe Name: Apple Walnut Chicken Salad with Greek Yogurt
Description: A creamy and crunchy chicken salad with sweet apples, toasted walnuts, and a light yogurt dressing.
Ingredients: 1 lb cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, chopped. 2 medium apples, diced. 1 cup seedless grapes, halved. 1 cup chopped celery. 1/4 cup sliced green onions. 1/2 cup walnuts, roughly chopped. 3/4 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon mayonnaise. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard. Salt and pepper to taste. 4 cups mixed salad greens
Instructions: 1. In a large bowl combine chopped chicken, apples, grapes, celery, green onions, and walnuts. 2. In a small bowl whisk Greek yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, Dijon, salt, and pepper until smooth. 3. Pour the dressing over the chicken mixture and fold to coat evenly. 4. Place mixed greens in a serving bowl or on plates. 5. Spoon the chicken salad over the greens and serve chilled.

Description: A fresh, hearty sandwich layered with lean turkey, creamy avocado, and crunchy sprouts.
Ingredients: 4 slices whole grain bread. 8 oz sliced roasted turkey breast. 1 ripe avocado, sliced. 2 large romaine leaves. 1 medium tomato, sliced. 1/2 cup alfalfa sprouts. 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise. 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard. Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Toast the bread if desired. 2. In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise and Dijon mustard. 3. Spread the mixture on one side of each bread slice. 4. Layer turkey, avocado, tomato, romaine, and sprouts on two slices. 5. Season with a pinch of salt and pepper. 6. Top with the remaining bread slices, slice in half, and serve.

Description: An Italian-style sandwich with mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, basil, and pesto on warm ciabatta.
Ingredients: 2 ciabatta rolls, split. 4 oz fresh mozzarella, sliced. 2 medium tomatoes, sliced. 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves. 2 tablespoons pesto. 2 teaspoons balsamic glaze. Pinch of salt and black pepper
Instructions: 1. Lightly warm or toast the ciabatta rolls. 2. Spread pesto on the cut sides of each roll. 3. Layer mozzarella, tomato slices, and basil leaves. 4. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and season with salt and pepper. 5. Close the sandwiches, press gently, slice, and serve.

Description: A zesty plant-based sandwich with creamy smashed chickpeas and a touch of heat.
Ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, 15 oz, rinsed and drained. 4 slices whole grain bread. 2 tablespoons plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon tahini. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon sriracha. 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped. 1/4 cup celery, finely diced. 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin. Salt and pepper to taste. Lettuce leaves
Instructions: 1. In a bowl, mash chickpeas with a fork until chunky. 2. Stir in yogurt, tahini, lemon juice, sriracha, cumin, red onion, celery, salt, and pepper. 3. Toast the bread if desired. 4. Place lettuce on two slices, spoon on the chickpea mixture, and top with remaining slices. 5. Slice and serve.

Description: A deli favorite featuring creamy tuna salad with crisp celery on soft sourdough.
Ingredients: 2 cans tuna, 5 oz each, drained. 4 slices sourdough bread. 3 tablespoons mayonnaise. 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard. 1/4 cup celery, finely diced. 2 tablespoons red onion, finely chopped. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 2 romaine leaves. Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine drained tuna, mayonnaise, mustard, celery, red onion, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 2. Mix until evenly coated. 3. Lightly toast sourdough if desired. 4. Place romaine on two slices, add tuna salad, and top with remaining slices. 5. Slice in half and serve.

Recipe Name: Bacon Egg and Cheese English Muffin Sandwich
Description: A classic breakfast sandwich with fluffy eggs, crispy bacon, and melty cheddar on a whole wheat English muffin.
Ingredients: 2 whole wheat English muffins, split. 4 large eggs. 2 slices cheddar cheese. 4 slices cooked bacon. 1 tablespoon butter. Salt and pepper to taste. Optional hot sauce
Instructions: 1. Cook bacon until crisp and set aside on paper towels. 2. Heat half the butter in a nonstick skillet over medium and scramble or fry two eggs, seasoning with salt and pepper. Repeat with remaining butter and eggs. 3. Lightly toast the English muffins. 4. Layer egg, cheddar, and bacon on each muffin bottom. 5. Add hot sauce if desired, cap with muffin tops, and serve warm.

Description: A silky, aromatic tomato soup with sweet carrots and fresh basil, perfect with crusty bread.
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 large onion, chopped. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 2 medium carrots, diced. 2 cans diced tomatoes, 14.5 ounces each. 3 cups low-sodium vegetable broth. 1 tablespoon tomato paste. 1 teaspoon sugar. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1 cup fresh basil leaves, loosely packed. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Warm the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. 2. Add onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes, then stir in garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Add carrots and tomato paste and cook 2 minutes, stirring. 4. Pour in diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, sugar, and oregano, bring to a simmer, cover, and cook 20 minutes until carrots are tender. 5. Blend the soup until smooth using an immersion blender or carefully in batches. 6. Stir in basil, season with salt and pepper, and simmer 2 minutes before serving.

Description: A comforting classic loaded with tender chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles in savory broth.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 medium onion, chopped. 2 carrots, sliced. 2 celery stalks, sliced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 8 cups low-sodium chicken broth. 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into bite-size pieces. 1 bay leaf. 1 teaspoon dried thyme. 1 cup egg noodles, uncooked. Salt and black pepper to taste. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped.
Instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat and soften onion, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes. 2. Stir in garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Add chicken broth, chicken, bay leaf, and thyme, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 12 to 15 minutes until chicken is cooked through. 4. Add egg noodles and simmer until tender, 6 to 8 minutes. 5. Remove bay leaf, season with salt and pepper, and stir in parsley before serving.

Description: Velvety squash blended with ginger and light coconut milk for a cozy, dairy-free soup.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 large butternut squash, peeled and cubed, about 2.2 pounds. 1 medium onion, chopped. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced. 1 teaspoon curry powder. 4 cups low-sodium vegetable broth. 1 cup light coconut milk. 1 tablespoon lime juice. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Warm olive oil in a large pot over medium heat and cook onion until soft, about 4 minutes. 2. Add garlic, ginger, and curry powder and cook 1 minute until fragrant. 3. Stir in butternut squash and vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then cover and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until squash is tender. 4. Blend the soup until smooth. 5. Return to the pot, stir in coconut milk and lime juice, and season with salt and pepper. 6. Heat gently and serve.

Description: A hearty, protein-rich soup with earthy lentils, vegetables, and a bright lemon finish.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 medium onion, chopped. 2 carrots, diced. 2 celery stalks, diced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 cup dry brown lentils, rinsed. 1 can diced tomatoes, 14.5 ounces. 5 cups low-sodium vegetable broth. 4 cups fresh spinach, roughly chopped. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat, add onion, carrots, and celery, and cook 5 minutes. 2. Stir in garlic and cumin for 30 seconds. 3. Add lentils, tomatoes, and broth, bring to a boil, then cover and simmer 25 to 30 minutes until lentils are tender. 4. Stir in spinach and cook until wilted, 2 minutes. 5. Finish with lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.

Description: A vegetable-packed Italian soup with beans, pasta, and greens in a tomato-herb broth.
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 medium onion, chopped. 2 carrots, diced. 2 celery stalks, diced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 zucchini, diced. 1 can diced tomatoes, 14.5 ounces. 1 can cannellini beans, 15 ounces, rinsed and drained. 6 cups low-sodium vegetable broth. 3 ounces small pasta, such as ditalini. 2 cups chopped kale. 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. Salt and black pepper to taste. 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan for serving.
Instructions: 1. Warm olive oil in a large pot over medium heat and cook onion, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes. 2. Add garlic and zucchini and cook 2 minutes. 3. Stir in tomatoes, beans, broth, Italian seasoning, and bring to a boil. 4. Add pasta and simmer until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes. 5. Stir in kale and cook until tender, 3 minutes. 6. Season with salt and pepper and serve with Parmesan.

Recipe Name: Greek Village Salad with Feta and Olives
Description: A crisp and savory Mediterranean salad loaded with juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, briny olives, and creamy feta in a simple oregano vinaigrette.
Ingredients: 2 medium cucumbers, diced. 4 medium ripe tomatoes, cut into wedges. 1 small red onion, thinly sliced. 1 cup kalamata olives, pitted. 5 ounces feta cheese, cubed. 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil. 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, olives, and feta in a large bowl. 2. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper until emulsified. 3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat. 4. Let stand 10 minutes for flavors to meld. 5. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

Recipe Name: Strawberry Spinach Salad with Feta and Pecans
Description: A fresh sweet and tangy salad featuring tender spinach, juicy strawberries, crunchy pecans, and creamy feta with a balsamic poppy seed dressing.
