Ingredients: 8 cups baby spinach. 2 cups strawberries, hulled and sliced. 1 cup crumbled feta cheese. 1 small red onion, thinly sliced. 1/2 cup pecans, toasted and roughly chopped. 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil. 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar. 1 tablespoon honey. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard. 1 teaspoon poppy seeds. Pinch of salt and black pepper
Instructions: 1. Add spinach, strawberries, feta, red onion, and pecans to a large bowl. 2. In a small jar, combine olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, Dijon, poppy seeds, salt, and pepper. 3. Shake or whisk until smooth and slightly thickened. 4. Drizzle over the salad and toss gently to coat. 5. Serve immediately

Recipe Name: Southwest Black Bean and Corn Salad with Lime Cilantro Dressing
Description: A hearty colorful salad packed with beans, corn, avocado, and fresh veggies tossed in a zesty lime dressing.
Ingredients: 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained. 1 1/2 cups corn kernels, thawed if frozen. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1 red bell pepper, diced. 1/2 small red onion, finely chopped. 1 large avocado, diced. 1/2 cup fresh cilantro, chopped. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 teaspoon chili powder. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. In a large bowl combine black beans, corn, tomatoes, bell pepper, red onion, avocado, and cilantro. 2. In a small bowl whisk together olive oil, lime juice, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper. 3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine. 4. Chill for 15 minutes to let flavors mingle. 5. Serve with extra lime if desired

Description: A crunchy protein packed salad with shredded cabbage, carrots, edamame, and grilled chicken tossed in a bright sesame soy dressing.
Ingredients: 6 cups shredded green cabbage. 2 medium carrots, julienned. 1 1/2 cups shelled edamame, cooked and cooled. 2 cups cooked chicken breast, sliced. 2 scallions, thinly sliced. 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped. 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, toasted. 3 tablespoons rice vinegar. 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 1/2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil. 1 tablespoon honey. 1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger. 1 small garlic clove, minced. 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice
Instructions: 1. In a large bowl combine cabbage, carrots, edamame, chicken, scallions, cilantro, and sesame seeds. 2. In a measuring cup whisk together rice vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, ginger, garlic, and lime juice. 3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss until evenly coated. 4. Let sit 10 minutes to soften the cabbage slightly. 5. Serve and garnish with extra sesame seeds if desired

Recipe Name: Roasted Beet and Goat Cheese Salad with Walnuts and Arugula
Description: A vibrant earthy salad of sweet roasted beets, peppery arugula, creamy goat cheese, and crunchy walnuts with a balsamic Dijon dressing.
Ingredients: 4 medium beets, trimmed and scrubbed. 4 cups arugula. 4 ounces goat cheese, crumbled. 1/2 cup walnuts, toasted and chopped. 2 medium oranges, segmented. 1/4 small red onion, very thinly sliced. 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil. 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400 F. Wrap beets individually in foil and roast on a baking sheet for 45 to 60 minutes until tender. 2. Unwrap and cool until easy to handle, then peel and cut into bite size wedges. 3. In a large bowl add arugula, roasted beets, orange segments, red onion, goat cheese, and walnuts. 4. In a small bowl whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, Dijon, salt, and pepper. 5. Drizzle over the salad, toss gently, and serve

Description: A classic Caesar salad wrap with tender grilled chicken, crisp romaine, and creamy dressing in a hearty tortilla.
Ingredients: 4 large whole wheat tortillas. 400 g grilled chicken breast sliced. 3 cups romaine lettuce chopped. 1 cup cherry tomatoes halved. 1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1/4 cup Caesar dressing. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. Freshly ground black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave until pliable. 2. In a bowl combine chicken, romaine, cherry tomatoes, Parmesan, Caesar dressing, lemon juice, and black pepper and toss to coat. 3. Lay tortillas flat and divide the filling evenly down the center of each. 4. Fold the sides over the filling and roll tightly from the bottom up. 5. Slice if desired and serve immediately.

Description: A fresh, crunchy, plant-powered wrap layered with creamy hummus and ripe avocado.
Ingredients: 4 large whole wheat tortillas. 1 cup hummus. 1 medium cucumber thinly sliced. 1 cup roasted red pepper strips. 1 cup shredded carrots. 2 cups baby spinach. 1 medium avocado sliced. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon za'atar optional.
Instructions: 1. Warm tortillas until flexible. 2. Spread a generous layer of hummus over each tortilla leaving a small border. 3. Top with cucumber, roasted red peppers, carrots, spinach, and avocado and drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle with za'atar if using. 4. Fold in the sides and roll up tightly. 5. Slice and serve or wrap for later.

Recipe Name: Spicy Black Bean and Brown Rice Wrap
Description: A hearty, zesty wrap packed with fiber-rich beans, brown rice, melty cheddar, and a kick of salsa.
Ingredients: 4 large flour tortillas. 1 can black beans drained and rinsed. 2 cups cooked brown rice. 1 cup corn kernels. 1 cup salsa. 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese. 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon lime juice. 1 teaspoon chili powder. 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin. Fresh cilantro chopped.
Instructions: 1. In a skillet combine black beans, brown rice, corn, salsa, chili powder, cumin, and lime juice and heat over medium for 3 to 4 minutes until warmed through. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Divide the warm filling among tortillas and top with cheddar, a spoonful of yogurt, and cilantro. 4. Fold in sides and roll up tightly. 5. Serve immediately or toast the wrapped burritos briefly in the skillet for a golden exterior.

Description: A protein-packed breakfast wrap with fluffy eggs, sautéed veggies, and a salty feta finish.
Ingredients: 4 large whole wheat tortillas. 8 large eggs. 2 tablespoons milk. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cups baby spinach. 1 cup sliced mushrooms. 1 cup cherry tomatoes halled. 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese. Salt and black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Whisk eggs with milk, a pinch of salt, and pepper. 2. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sauté mushrooms for 3 minutes. 3. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 4. Pour in eggs and scramble gently until just set. 5. Warm tortillas and divide egg mixture among them and top with tomatoes and feta. 6. Fold and roll tightly and serve warm.

Description: A bright, savory tuna salad with crunchy veggies, olives, and feta bundled in a soft tortilla.
Ingredients: 4 large whole wheat tortillas. 2 cans tuna in water drained. 1/3 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1/4 cup finely chopped red onion. 1/2 cup chopped celery. 1 cup diced cucumber. 1 cup cherry tomatoes halved. 1/4 cup sliced Kalamata olives. 1/3 cup crumbled feta cheese. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley. Black pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. In a bowl mix tuna with Greek yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, black pepper, red onion, celery, and parsley. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Spread tuna salad down the center of each tortilla and add cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta. 4. Fold in the sides and roll up firmly. 5. Serve immediately or chill for a refreshing wrap.

Description: A hearty bowl layered with roasted Mediterranean vegetables, creamy hummus, and bright herbs.
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, uncooked. 2 cups water. 1 small eggplant, diced. 1 red bell pepper, sliced. 1 small zucchini, sliced. 1 small red onion, cut into wedges. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. Salt and pepper to taste. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1/2 cup crumbled feta. 1/2 cup hummus. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
Instructions: 1. Rinse the quinoa under cold water. 2. Combine quinoa and water in a pot, bring to a boil, cover, and simmer on low for 15 minutes, then fluff. 3. Toss eggplant, bell pepper, zucchini, and red onion with olive oil, oregano, paprika, salt, and pepper, then roast at 425 F for 20 to 25 minutes until tender. 4. In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, roasted vegetables, cherry tomatoes, and lemon juice, and toss gently. 5. Divide into bowls and top with hummus, feta, and parsley

Description: A savory, saucy bowl with crispy tofu, colorful vegetables, and a glossy teriyaki glaze.
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, uncooked. 2 cups water. 14 oz firm tofu, pressed and cubed. 1 cup broccoli florets. 1 medium carrot, thinly sliced. 1 red bell pepper, sliced. 1 tablespoon avocado oil. 2 teaspoons sesame oil. 3 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon maple syrup. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger. 1 clove garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon cornstarch mixed with 1 tablespoon water. 1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds. 2 green onions, sliced
Instructions: 1. Rinse quinoa, then cook with water as directed until tender, and fluff. 2. Heat avocado oil in a skillet, add tofu, and cook until golden on all sides. 3. Add broccoli, carrot, and bell pepper with sesame oil and stir-fry until crisp tender. 4. Stir in soy sauce, maple syrup, rice vinegar, ginger, and garlic, then add the cornstarch slurry and simmer until thickened. 5. Serve tofu and vegetables over quinoa, and garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

Recipe Name: Southwest Black Bean and Corn Quinoa Bowl
Description: A zesty, colorful bowl packed with plant protein, creamy avocado, and bright lime.
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, uncooked. 2 cups water. 1 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained. 1 cup corn kernels. 1 medium tomato, diced. 1/2 cup red onion, finely chopped. 1 avocado, diced. 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons lime juice. 1 teaspoon chili powder. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Rinse quinoa and cook with water until tender, then fluff and cool slightly. 2. In a large bowl, combine black beans, corn, tomato, red onion, and avocado. 3. Whisk olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. 4. Add quinoa to the vegetables, pour over the dressing, and toss gently. 5. Top with cilantro and serve

Description: A fresh and filling bowl with juicy chicken, briny olives, crisp veggies, and tangy feta.
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, uncooked. 2 cups water. 12 oz boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced. 1 cup cucumber, diced. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1/4 cup red onion, thinly sliced. 1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved. 1/2 cup crumbled feta. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. Salt and pepper to taste. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
Instructions: 1. Rinse and cook quinoa with water until tender, then fluff. 2. Season chicken with oregano, salt, and pepper, and cook in a skillet with a little olive oil over medium heat until cooked through. 3. In a bowl, combine cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, lemon juice, and the remaining olive oil. 4. Add warm quinoa and sliced chicken to bowls and spoon the veggie mixture over top. 5. Sprinkle with feta and parsley and serve

Recipe Name: Breakfast Quinoa Bowl with Berries and Yogurt
Description: A cozy, lightly sweet breakfast bowl with creamy yogurt, fresh berries, and crunchy almonds.
Ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, uncooked. 2 cups water. 1 1/2 cups plain Greek yogurt. 1 cup mixed berries. 2 tablespoons honey. 2 tablespoons chopped almonds. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon. Pinch of salt
Instructions: 1. Rinse quinoa and cook with water over low heat for 15 minutes, then fluff. 2. Stir in vanilla, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt, and let cool slightly. 3. Divide quinoa into bowls and spoon Greek yogurt over each. 4. Top with mixed berries and drizzle with honey. 5. Sprinkle with chopped almonds and serve warm or chilled

Description: A satisfying grain bowl with crispy tofu, hearty brown rice, and bright vegetables in a glossy teriyaki glaze.
Ingredients: 1 cup brown rice, uncooked. 2 cups water. 14 ounces extra firm tofu, pressed and cubed. 1 tablespoon cornstarch. 1 tablespoon sesame oil. 1 cup broccoli florets. 1 cup shredded carrots. 1 red bell pepper, sliced. 2 green onions, sliced. 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon maple syrup. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 teaspoon grated ginger. 1 clove garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds. Lime wedges and chopped cilantro optional.
Instructions: 1. Rinse the brown rice and cook with water according to package directions until tender, then fluff and keep warm. 2. Pat tofu dry, toss with cornstarch, and heat sesame oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. 3. Sear tofu on all sides until golden and crisp, then remove to a plate. 4. In the same skillet, add broccoli, carrots, and bell pepper and cook 3 to 4 minutes until crisp tender. 5. Whisk soy sauce, maple syrup, rice vinegar, ginger, and garlic, then pour into the skillet. 6. Return tofu to the pan and toss until the sauce thickens and coats everything. 7. Divide rice into bowls, top with tofu and vegetables, sprinkle with green onions and sesame seeds, and add cilantro and lime if desired.

Recipe Name: Farro Greek Bowl with Chicken and Feta
Description: A Mediterranean style grain bowl with chewy farro, juicy chicken, crisp vegetables, and a lemon oregano dressing.
Ingredients: 1 cup farro, uncooked. 2 1/2 cups water. 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast, cooked and sliced. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1 medium cucumber, diced. 1/3 cup pitted Kalamata olives, sliced. 1/4 cup red onion, thinly sliced. 2 cups baby spinach. 1/2 cup feta cheese, crumbled. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1 clove garlic, minced. Salt and pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Rinse farro and simmer in water until tender, then drain and fluff. 2. Season chicken with salt, pepper, and oregano, cook in a skillet or grill pan until done, and slice. 3. In a large bowl combine farro, spinach, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and red onion. 4. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper, then drizzle over the bowl and toss. 5. Top with sliced chicken and feta and serve warm or at room temperature.

Description: A savory and wholesome bowl featuring tender salmon, nutty barley, and crisp vegetables with a miso sesame dressing.
Ingredients: 1 cup pearled barley, uncooked. 3 cups water. 4 salmon fillets, about 4 ounces each. 1 cup shelled edamame. 1 small cucumber, diced. 6 radishes, thinly sliced. 1 medium carrot, shredded. 2 tablespoons white miso paste. 1 tablespoon low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon honey. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 tablespoon sesame oil. 1 tablespoon sesame seeds. 2 green onions, sliced. Salt and pepper to taste.
Instructions: 1. Rinse barley and simmer in water until tender, then drain and keep warm. 2. Season salmon with salt and pepper and bake at 400 F for 10 to 12 minutes or until just cooked through. 3. Steam or microwave edamame until warm. 4. In a small bowl whisk miso, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, and sesame oil to make the dressing. 5. Divide barley into bowls and arrange salmon, edamame, cucumber, radishes, and carrot on top. 6. Drizzle with miso dressing, sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions, and serve.

Description: A plant based grain bowl with fragrant spiced chickpeas, fluffy bulgur, and a creamy lemon tahini sauce.
Ingredients: 1 cup bulgur wheat, uncooked. 2 cups water. 2 cups canned chickpeas, rinsed and drained. 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. 1 medium cucumber, diced. 1 cup shredded red cabbage. 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley. 1/4 cup tahini. 3 tablespoons lemon juice. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 clove garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 teaspoon ground coriander. 1 teaspoon paprika. 1/2 teaspoon turmeric. Salt and pepper to taste. 2 to 3 tablespoons water to thin sauce.
Instructions: 1. Simmer bulgur in water until tender, then fluff and set aside. 2. Pat chickpeas dry, toss with cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper, then sauté in olive oil over medium heat until lightly crisped. 3. Whisk tahini, lemon juice, garlic, a pinch of salt, and water until smooth and pourable. 4. In bowls add bulgur, warm spiced chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, and red cabbage. 5. Drizzle with tahini sauce, sprinkle with parsley, and serve.

Recipe Name: Warm Steel Cut Oat Breakfast Grain Bowl with Berries and Almonds
Description: A cozy breakfast grain bowl of creamy steel cut oats topped with fresh fruit, crunchy almonds, and chia.
Ingredients: 1 cup steel cut oats, uncooked. 3 cups water. 1 cup unsweetened almond milk. 1 cup blueberries. 1 cup sliced strawberries. 1 medium banana, sliced. 1/4 cup chopped almonds. 2 tablespoons chia seeds. 1 tablespoon maple syrup. 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon. Pinch of salt.
Instructions: 1. Bring water and almond milk to a gentle boil, stir in oats and a pinch of salt, reduce heat, and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until creamy, stirring occasionally. 2. Stir in vanilla and cinnamon. 3. Divide oats into bowls and top with blueberries, strawberries, and banana. 4. Sprinkle with almonds and chia seeds and drizzle with maple syrup. 5. Serve warm.

Description: A fresh and vibrant bowl with tender ahi tuna, creamy avocado, and crisp vegetables over sushi rice.
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked sushi rice. 8 oz sashimi grade ahi tuna, diced. 1 cup cucumber, diced. 1 cup mango, diced. 1 avocado, sliced. 1 cup shelled edamame, cooked. 2 green onions, thinly sliced. 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 teaspoons honey. 1 teaspoon sriracha. 1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds. 1 sheet nori, shredded.
Instructions: 1. Prepare the rice and let it cool slightly. 2. In a small bowl whisk soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, honey, and sriracha. 3. Toss the diced tuna with 2 tablespoons of the sauce and set aside. 4. Divide rice into bowls and top with tuna, cucumber, mango, avocado, edamame, and green onions. 5. Drizzle remaining sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds and nori, and serve.

Description: A satisfying poke bowl featuring rich salmon, creamy avocado, and crunchy vegetables with a light soy sesame dressing.
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked brown rice. 8 oz sashimi grade salmon, diced. 1 cup shelled edamame, cooked. 1 avocado, sliced. 1 cup cucumber, diced. 1 cup purple cabbage, shredded. 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil. 1 teaspoon honey. 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, grated. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds. 2 green onions, thinly sliced.
Instructions: 1. Prepare the rice and let it cool slightly. 2. In a small bowl whisk soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, honey, and ginger. 3. Lightly toss the salmon with 2 tablespoons of the dressing. 4. Arrange rice in bowls and add salmon, edamame, avocado, cucumber, and cabbage. 5. Spoon remaining dressing over the bowls, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions, and serve.

Description: A zesty bowl with tender shrimp, spicy mayo, sweet pineapple, and creamy avocado over fragrant rice.
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked jasmine rice. 8 oz cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined. 1 cup pineapple, diced. 1 cup cucumber, diced. 1 cup carrots, shredded. 1 avocado, sliced. 1 cup shelled edamame, cooked. 2 tablespoons mayonnaise. 2 tablespoons sriracha. 1 tablespoon lime juice. 1 tablespoon soy sauce. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds. 2 green onions, thinly sliced.
Instructions: 1. Prepare the rice and let it cool slightly. 2. In a bowl mix mayonnaise, sriracha, lime juice, soy sauce, and sesame oil to make the spicy sauce. 3. Toss the shrimp with a few spoonfuls of the sauce. 4. Divide rice into bowls and top with shrimp, pineapple, cucumber, carrots, avocado, and edamame. 5. Drizzle remaining sauce, sprinkle sesame seeds and green onions, and serve.

Description: A plant powered poke bowl with crispy tofu, creamy avocado, and crunchy veggies in a savory sesame soy dressing.
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked short grain brown rice. 12 oz extra firm tofu, pressed and cubed. 1 cup shelled edamame, cooked. 1 avocado, sliced. 1 cup cucumber, diced. 1 cup carrots, shredded. 1 cup radishes, sliced. 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 teaspoons maple syrup. 2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil. 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, grated. 1 small garlic clove, minced. 2 teaspoons sesame seeds. 2 green onions, thinly sliced.
Instructions: 1. Pat tofu dry then pan sear or bake until golden and warmed through. 2. Whisk soy sauce, rice vinegar, maple syrup, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic to make the dressing. 3. Toss warm tofu with 2 tablespoons of the dressing. 4. Divide rice into bowls and add tofu, edamame, avocado, cucumber, carrots, and radishes. 5. Spoon remaining dressing over the bowls, sprinkle sesame seeds and green onions, and serve.

Description: A hearty bowl with juicy teriyaki chicken, sweet pineapple, crisp veggies, and creamy avocado over steamed rice.
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked white rice. 10 oz cooked chicken breast, cubed. 1 cup pineapple, diced. 1 cup cucumber, diced. 1 cup red cabbage, shredded. 1 avocado, sliced. 1 cup shelled edamame, cooked. 3 tablespoons teriyaki sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 2 teaspoons sesame seeds. 2 green onions, thinly sliced.
Instructions: 1. Prepare the rice and let it cool slightly. 2. Warm the chicken and toss with teriyaki sauce, rice vinegar, and sesame oil. 3. Divide rice into bowls and top with chicken, pineapple, cucumber, cabbage, avocado, and edamame. 4. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and green onions. 5. Serve immediately.

Recipe Name: Garlic Ginger Beef Stir Fry with Vegetables
Description: A quick and colorful skillet meal with tender beef and crisp vegetables in a savory garlic ginger sauce.
Ingredients: 1 lb flank steak, thinly sliced against the grain. 3 cups broccoli florets. 1 medium red bell pepper, sliced. 1 cup snow peas, trimmed. 1 large carrot, thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated. 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 2 tablespoons oyster sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 teaspoon brown sugar. 2 teaspoons cornstarch. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 2 green onions, sliced. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, optional. Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. In a small bowl whisk soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice vinegar, brown sugar, cornstarch, and sesame oil until smooth. 2. Pat beef dry and season lightly with salt and pepper. 3. Heat a large skillet or wok over high heat with neutral oil, then sear beef in two batches for 2 to 3 minutes until just browned, remove to a plate. 4. Add broccoli, bell pepper, snow peas, and carrot to the pan and stir fry 3 to 4 minutes until crisp tender. 5. Add garlic and ginger and cook 30 seconds, return beef and pour in the sauce, toss 1 to 2 minutes until glossy and thickened. 6. Remove from heat, sprinkle green onions and sesame seeds, and serve immediately

Description: Tender strips of beef and sautéed mushrooms in a creamy, tangy sauce served over egg noodles.
Ingredients: 8 ounces egg noodles, uncooked. 1 lb beef sirloin, thinly sliced. 12 ounces cremini mushrooms, sliced. 1 medium onion, thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 tablespoons butter. 1 tablespoon all purpose flour. 1 1/2 cups beef broth. 3/4 cup sour cream. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard. 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped. Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Cook egg noodles in salted boiling water according to package directions, drain and set aside. 2. Season beef with salt and pepper, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high and sear beef in batches 2 to 3 minutes, remove to a plate. 3. Add butter to the skillet, sauté onion and mushrooms with a pinch of salt for 6 to 8 minutes until browned, add garlic and cook 30 seconds. 4. Sprinkle flour over vegetables and stir 1 minute, then whisk in beef broth, Dijon, and Worcestershire, simmer 3 to 4 minutes until slightly thickened. 5. Reduce heat to low, stir in sour cream until smooth, return beef and its juices, simmer 2 minutes, season to taste. 6. Toss with cooked noodles, garnish with parsley, and serve

Description: Zesty ground beef tucked into warm corn tortillas with crisp cabbage, fresh tomato, avocado, and a squeeze of lime.
Ingredients: 1 lb lean ground beef. 1 small onion, finely chopped. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 2 teaspoons chili powder. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 2 tablespoons tomato paste. 1/2 cup water. Salt and pepper to taste. 12 small corn tortillas. 2 cups shredded cabbage. 1 cup diced tomato or pico de gallo. 1 ripe avocado, sliced. 1 lime, cut into wedges. 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
Instructions: 1. Heat a skillet over medium high, add beef and onion, cook 5 to 7 minutes breaking up meat until browned, drain excess fat if needed. 2. Stir in garlic, chili powder, cumin, and smoked paprika for 30 seconds, add tomato paste and water, simmer 3 to 4 minutes until thick, season to taste. 3. Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or wrapped in a damp towel in the microwave until pliable. 4. Fill tortillas with beef, cabbage, tomato, and avocado. 5. Finish with cilantro and lime juice and serve

Description: A comforting, broth based soup loaded with tender beef, potatoes, and garden vegetables.
Ingredients: 1 1/4 lb beef chuck, cut into 1 inch cubes. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 large onion, diced. 2 celery stalks, diced. 3 medium carrots, sliced. 2 medium potatoes, diced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 can diced tomatoes 14.5 ounces. 1 cup green beans, chopped. 6 cups low sodium beef broth. 1 bay leaf. 1 teaspoon dried thyme. Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Pat beef dry, season with salt and pepper, and sear in olive oil in a large pot over medium high heat until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes. 2. Add onion, celery, and carrots and cook 4 minutes, then add garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Stir in tomatoes, broth, bay leaf, and thyme, bring to a boil, reduce to a gentle simmer, cover, and cook 45 minutes. 4. Add potatoes and green beans and simmer uncovered 20 to 25 minutes until vegetables are tender and beef is soft. 5. Remove bay leaf, adjust seasoning, and serve hot

Description: Sweet savory marinated beef seared hot and served over steamed rice with crisp vegetables and sesame.
Ingredients: 1 lb beef sirloin, very thinly sliced. 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce. 2 tablespoons brown sugar. 1/2 cup grated Asian pear or apple. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated. 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 3 scallions, sliced. 4 cups cooked white rice. 1 small cucumber, thinly sliced. 1 medium carrot, julienned. 1 cup kimchi, optional. 2 teaspoons sesame seeds
Instructions: 1. In a bowl combine soy sauce, brown sugar, grated pear, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil, add beef and marinate 20 to 30 minutes. 2. Heat a large skillet over high heat with neutral oil, cook beef in a single layer 2 to 3 minutes until caramelized, working in batches, then toss in scallions. 3. Divide warm rice into bowls, top with beef, cucumber, carrot, and kimchi if using. 4. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve immediately

Description: A golden, cheesy chicken cutlet baked in marinara with bubbly mozzarella and fresh basil.
Ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 6 ounces each, pounded 1/2 inch thick. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. 2 large eggs, beaten. 1 cup Italian breadcrumbs. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 4 tablespoons olive oil. 2 cups marinara sauce. 6 ounces low-moisture mozzarella, shredded or sliced. 2 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat in a mix of breadcrumbs, Parmesan, oregano, and garlic powder. 3. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and sear two cutlets per side until golden, about 2 to 3 minutes each. Repeat with remaining oil and cutlets. 4. Spread 1 cup marinara in a 9x13 inch baking dish, nestle cutlets on top, spoon remaining sauce over. 5. Top with mozzarella and bake 12 to 15 minutes until cheese is melted and chicken reaches 165°F. Garnish with basil and serve.

Description: A lighter, oven-crisp version with panko crunch, silky marinara, and melted mozzarella.
Ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 5 ounces each, pounded 1/2 inch thick. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 2 large eggs, beaten. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cups marinara sauce. 4 ounces part-skim mozzarella, shredded. 2 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan with parchment. 2. Mix panko, Parmesan, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, and olive oil. 3. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Dip in eggs, then press into panko mixture to coat. 4. Bake cutlets 12 to 15 minutes, flipping once, until crisp and 160°F. 5. Transfer to a baking dish, spoon marinara over, top with mozzarella, and bake 5 minutes more until cheese is melted and chicken reaches 165°F. Garnish with basil.

Description: Extra-crispy cutlets made in the air fryer, finished with marinara and gooey mozzarella.
Ingredients: 4 chicken cutlets, 5 ounces each. 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. 2 large eggs, beaten. 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs. 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 1 tablespoon olive oil. Cooking spray. 1 1/2 cups marinara sauce. 4 ounces part-skim mozzarella, shredded. Fresh basil, chopped
Instructions: 1. Preheat air fryer to 390°F. 2. Season flour with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning. Dredge chicken in flour, dip in eggs, then coat in panko mixed with Parmesan and olive oil. 3. Mist air fryer basket with cooking spray. Air-fry chicken in a single layer 6 to 8 minutes per side until golden and 165°F. 4. Spoon marinara over cutlets, top with mozzarella, and air-fry 1 to 2 minutes to melt. 5. Rest 2 minutes and garnish with basil.

Description: Spicy, saucy chicken Parmesan simmered in fiery arrabbiata and crowned with melted mozzarella.
Ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 6 ounces each, pounded 1/2 inch thick. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. 2 large eggs, beaten. 1 cup plain breadcrumbs. 1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes. 1 teaspoon dried basil. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 2 1/2 cups arrabbiata sauce. 6 ounces low-moisture mozzarella, shredded. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped
Instructions: 1. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, dip in eggs, then coat in breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan, red pepper flakes, dried basil, and garlic powder. 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and brown cutlets 2 to 3 minutes per side. 3. Pour arrabbiata into the skillet, nestle cutlets, and simmer 5 minutes. 4. Top with mozzarella, cover, and cook 3 to 5 minutes until cheese melts and chicken reaches 165°F. 5. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.

Description: A grain-free baked Chicken Parmesan with a savory almond crust, bright marinara, and part-skim mozzarella.
Ingredients: 4 chicken cutlets, 5 ounces each. 1 cup almond flour. 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 2 large eggs, beaten. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cups marinara sauce. 4 ounces part-skim mozzarella, shredded. 2 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan with parchment. 2. Combine almond flour, Parmesan, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. 3. Dip chicken in eggs, then press into almond mixture to coat. 4. Arrange on the pan, drizzle or mist lightly with olive oil, and bake 14 to 16 minutes until crisp and 165°F. 5. Transfer to a baking dish, spoon marinara over, top with mozzarella, and bake 3 to 5 minutes to melt. Garnish with basil.

Description: A hearty layered pasta bake with rich meat sauce, creamy ricotta, and melted cheeses.
Ingredients: 12 lasagna noodles. 1 pound ground beef. 1 small onion diced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 28 ounces crushed tomatoes. 2 tablespoons tomato paste. 1 teaspoon sugar. 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 15 ounces ricotta cheese. 1 large egg. 3 cups shredded mozzarella. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 F. 2. Boil noodles in salted water until al dente then drain and lay flat on a sheet to prevent sticking. 3. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until translucent. Add garlic and cook 30 seconds. 4. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Drain excess fat. 5. Stir in crushed tomatoes tomato paste sugar Italian seasoning salt and pepper. Simmer 10 minutes. 6. In a bowl mix ricotta with egg and half the Parmesan. 7. Spread a thin layer of sauce in a 9 by 13 inch baking dish. Layer noodles ricotta mixture mozzarella and meat sauce. Repeat layers ending with sauce and remaining mozzarella and Parmesan. 8. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes more until bubbly. Rest 10 minutes before slicing. 9. Garnish with basil and serve

Description: A comforting vegetarian lasagna layered with garlicky spinach ricotta and bright marinara.
Ingredients: 12 lasagna noodles. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 small onion diced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 24 ounces marinara sauce. 16 ounces frozen spinach thawed and squeezed dry. 15 ounces ricotta cheese. 1 large egg. 2 cups shredded mozzarella. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan. 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 F. 2. Boil noodles until al dente then drain and set aside. 3. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook onion until soft then add garlic for 30 seconds. 4. Stir in spinach and cook until excess moisture evaporates. Season with salt pepper and nutmeg. 5. In a bowl combine ricotta egg and half the Parmesan. 6. Spread a thin layer of marinara in a 9 by 13 inch dish. Layer noodles ricotta spinach mozzarella and marinara. Repeat layers ending with marinara and remaining cheeses. 7. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes more until golden and bubbly. 8. Rest 10 minutes. Top with basil and serve

Description: A creamy white lasagna with tender chicken and a rich Parmesan Alfredo sauce.
Ingredients: 12 lasagna noodles. 4 tablespoons unsalted butter. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1/4 cup all purpose flour. 3 cups whole milk. 1/2 cup heavy cream. 1 1/2 cups grated Parmesan. 2 cups shredded mozzarella. 3 cups cooked shredded chicken. 2 tablespoons chopped parsley. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Pinch of ground nutmeg
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 F. 2. Boil noodles until al dente drain and set aside. 3. In a large saucepan melt butter with olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 30 seconds. Whisk in flour and cook 1 minute. 4. Gradually whisk in milk and cream. Simmer until thick and smooth. Stir in Parmesan salt pepper and nutmeg. 5. In a 9 by 13 inch dish spread a thin layer of sauce. Layer noodles chicken mozzarella and more sauce. Repeat layers ending with sauce and remaining mozzarella. 6. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes until bubbling and lightly browned. 7. Rest 10 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley and serve

Description: A vibrant lasagna packed with roasted eggplant zucchini peppers and mushrooms layered with ricotta and marinara.
Ingredients: 12 lasagna noodles. 1 medium eggplant cut into cubes. 2 medium zucchini sliced. 2 red bell peppers sliced. 8 ounces mushrooms sliced. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 1 small onion diced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 28 ounces marinara sauce. 15 ounces ricotta cheese. 2 cups shredded mozzarella. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan. 1 teaspoon dried oregano. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425 F. 2. Toss eggplant zucchini peppers and mushrooms with 2 tablespoons olive oil salt pepper and oregano. Roast on a sheet pan 20 to 25 minutes until tender and lightly browned. Reduce oven to 375 F. 3. Boil noodles until al dente then drain. 4. In a skillet heat remaining olive oil and sauté onion until soft then add garlic for 30 seconds. 5. In a bowl mix ricotta with a pinch of salt and half the Parmesan. 6. Spread marinara in a 9 by 13 inch dish. Layer noodles ricotta roasted vegetables mozzarella and more sauce. Repeat layers ending with sauce and remaining cheeses. 7. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes until bubbly. 8. Rest 10 minutes. Garnish with basil and serve

Description: A savory lasagna with sautéed mushrooms creamy ricotta and bright basil pesto.
Ingredients: 12 lasagna noodles. 1 1/2 pounds cremini mushrooms sliced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1 cup basil pesto. 15 ounces ricotta cheese. 2 cups shredded mozzarella. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan. 1 cup milk. 2 cups baby spinach. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1 teaspoon lemon zest
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 F. 2. Boil noodles until al dente then drain and set aside. 3. Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add mushrooms and cook until browned and most moisture evaporates. Add garlic and cook 30 seconds. Season with salt and pepper. 4. In a bowl stir ricotta milk and lemon zest until smooth. 5. Spread a thin layer of pesto in a 9 by 13 inch dish. Layer noodles ricotta mixture mushrooms spinach mozzarella and more pesto. Repeat layers ending with pesto and remaining cheeses. 6. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 to 15 minutes until bubbling and lightly browned. 7. Rest 10 minutes before slicing and serve

Description: A rich and silky Italian classic featuring crisp pancetta, eggs, and cheese that coat al dente pasta in a creamy sauce without cream.
Ingredients: 12 oz spaghetti. 6 oz pancetta, diced. 4 large eggs. 1 cup finely grated Parmesan and Pecorino Romano, mixed. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Salt to taste
Instructions: 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente, reserving 1 cup of pasta water, then drain. 2. In a large skillet over medium heat, cook pancetta in olive oil until crisp, then add garlic and cook 30 seconds, remove from heat. 3. In a bowl whisk eggs, cheese, and black pepper until smooth. 4. Add hot pasta to the skillet and toss, then pour in egg mixture off the heat and toss vigorously, adding splashes of reserved pasta water to create a silky sauce. 5. Adjust seasoning and serve immediately while hot.

Description: A lighter twist with sautéed mushrooms and tender spinach adding depth and freshness to the classic creamy carbonara sauce.
Ingredients: 10 oz spaghetti. 3 oz pancetta, diced. 8 oz cremini mushrooms, sliced. 4 cups baby spinach. 3 large eggs. 2 thirds cup finely grated Parmesan. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon black pepper. Salt to taste
Instructions: 1. Boil salted water and cook spaghetti until al dente, reserving 1 cup pasta water, then drain. 2. In a large skillet heat olive oil, cook pancetta until crisp, add mushrooms and sauté until browned, add garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Stir in spinach until just wilted, then remove skillet from heat. 4. Whisk eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper in a bowl. 5. Add hot pasta to the skillet, pour in egg mixture off heat, and toss vigorously, adding reserved pasta water as needed to achieve a creamy sauce. 6. Season to taste and serve.

Recipe Name: Turkey Bacon and Pea Pasta Carbonara
Description: A leaner carbonara with smoky turkey bacon and sweet peas for a pop of color and brightness.
Ingredients: 12 oz spaghetti. 6 slices turkey bacon, chopped. 1 cup peas, thawed if frozen. 3 large eggs. 3 quarters cup finely grated Parmesan. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon black pepper. Salt to taste
Instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente, reserving 1 cup pasta water, then drain. 2. In a skillet heat olive oil and cook turkey bacon until lightly crisp, add garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Add peas and warm through, then remove from heat. 4. Whisk eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper in a bowl. 5. Add hot pasta to the skillet and toss, pour in egg mixture off heat, and toss vigorously, adding reserved pasta water until creamy. 6. Season and serve immediately.

Description: Hearty and protein packed, this version folds tender chicken and a touch of pancetta into a glossy carbonara sauce.
Ingredients: 12 oz rigatoni. 12 oz cooked chicken breast, sliced. 3 oz pancetta, diced. 2 large eggs. 2 thirds cup finely grated Parmesan. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon black pepper. Salt and chopped parsley to taste
Instructions: 1. Boil salted water and cook rigatoni until al dente, reserving 1 cup pasta water, then drain. 2. In a large skillet cook pancetta in olive oil until crisp, add garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Add sliced cooked chicken and warm through, then remove from heat. 4. Whisk eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper in a bowl. 5. Add hot pasta to the skillet, pour in egg mixture off heat, and toss energetically, adding pasta water to achieve a creamy coating. 6. Season, sprinkle with parsley, and serve.

Recipe Name: Whole Wheat Spaghetti Carbonara with Asparagus and Lemon
Description: A fiber rich carbonara using whole wheat pasta, bright asparagus, and lemon zest for a fresh finish.
Ingredients: 12 oz whole wheat spaghetti. 4 oz pancetta, diced. 3 large eggs. 1 half cup finely grated Parmesan. 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and cut into bite size pieces. 1 teaspoon lemon zest. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon olive oil. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 1 teaspoon black pepper. Salt to taste
Instructions: 1. Bring salted water to a boil and cook whole wheat spaghetti until al dente, reserving 1 cup pasta water, then drain. 2. Sauté pancetta in olive oil until crisp, add garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Add asparagus and cook until crisp tender, then remove skillet from heat. 4. Whisk eggs, Parmesan, lemon zest, lemon juice, and black pepper. 5. Add hot pasta to the skillet, pour in egg mixture off heat, and toss vigorously, adding reserved pasta water until creamy. 6. Season and serve right away.

Description: A simple, beloved pizza with bright tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella, and fragrant basil.
Ingredients: 1 lb pizza dough. ½ cup pizza sauce. 8 oz fresh mozzarella, sliced. 2 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil. 2 tbsp grated Parmesan. ¼ tsp kosher salt. ¼ tsp black pepper. ¼ tsp red pepper flakes, optional. ¼ cup fresh basil leaves
Instructions: 1. Preheat the oven and a pizza stone or inverted baking sheet to 500°F for at least 30 minutes. 2. On a floured surface, stretch the dough into a 12-inch circle and transfer to parchment. 3. Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a ½-inch border. 4. Arrange mozzarella slices over the sauce and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes if using. 5. Slide the pizza onto the hot stone and bake 9–12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbling. 6. Brush or drizzle olive oil over the hot pizza and scatter fresh basil. 7. Rest 2 minutes, slice, and serve

Description: A classic pizzeria favorite with zesty tomato sauce, melty mozzarella, and crispy pepperoni.
Ingredients: 1 lb pizza dough. ½ cup pizza sauce. 2 cups shredded low-moisture mozzarella. 3 oz pepperoni slices. 1 tbsp olive oil. 1 tsp dried oregano. 1 tbsp grated Parmesan. Pinch of black pepper
Instructions: 1. Preheat the oven and a pizza stone or baking sheet to 500°F for 30 minutes. 2. Stretch the dough to a 12-inch round on parchment. 3. Spread sauce over the dough and sprinkle oregano and pepper. 4. Add mozzarella evenly and top with pepperoni. 5. Bake 9–12 minutes until the crust is crisp and the pepperoni edges curl. 6. Brush the crust lightly with olive oil, sprinkle Parmesan, rest briefly, then slice

Description: A colorful, loaded vegetable pizza with mushrooms, peppers, onions, olives, and spinach for fresh flavor and crunch.
Ingredients: 1 lb pizza dough. ½ cup pizza sauce. 1½ cups shredded mozzarella. 1 cup sliced mushrooms. ½ cup diced red bell pepper. ½ cup thinly sliced red onion. ¼ cup sliced black olives. 1 cup baby spinach. 1 tbsp olive oil. 1 tsp dried oregano. Pinch of salt and pepper
Instructions: 1. Preheat the oven and stone or baking sheet to 500°F for 30 minutes. 2. Stretch the dough to a 12-inch circle on parchment. 3. Spread sauce over the dough and sprinkle oregano, salt, and pepper. 4. Add mozzarella, then scatter mushrooms, bell pepper, onion, olives, and spinach. 5. Drizzle olive oil over the toppings. 6. Bake 10–12 minutes until the crust is golden and the vegetables are tender. 7. Rest 2 minutes, slice, and serve

Description: A smoky-sweet pie topped with tender chicken, red onion, mozzarella, and gouda finished with fresh cilantro.
Ingredients: 1 lb pizza dough. ½ cup BBQ sauce. 1 cup cooked shredded chicken breast. ½ cup thinly sliced red onion. 1½ cups shredded mozzarella. ½ cup shredded smoked gouda. 1 tbsp olive oil. 2 tbsp chopped fresh cilantro. Pinch of black pepper
Instructions: 1. Preheat the oven and stone or baking sheet to 500°F for 30 minutes. 2. Stretch the dough to a 12-inch round on parchment. 3. Spread BBQ sauce over the dough and season with pepper. 4. Top with mozzarella and gouda, then scatter chicken and red onion. 5. Drizzle olive oil over the toppings. 6. Bake 10–12 minutes until cheese is bubbly and edges are browned. 7. Garnish with cilantro, rest briefly, and slice

Description: A creamy, garlicky white pizza layered with ricotta, mozzarella, spinach, and tangy feta.
Ingredients: 1 lb pizza dough. 2 tbsp olive oil. 2 garlic cloves, minced. ¾ cup ricotta cheese. 1 cup shredded mozzarella. ½ cup crumbled feta. 2 cups baby spinach. ¼ tsp red pepper flakes, optional. Pinch of salt and black pepper. ½ tsp lemon zest, optional
Instructions: 1. Preheat the oven and stone or baking sheet to 500°F for 30 minutes. 2. In a small bowl, stir olive oil with minced garlic. 3. Stretch the dough to a 12-inch circle on parchment and brush with garlic oil. 4. Dollop ricotta over the dough and spread gently, then sprinkle mozzarella. 5. Scatter spinach and feta over the top, add red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, and lemon zest if using. 6. Bake 10–12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is melted. 7. Rest 2 minutes, slice, and serve

Recipe Name: Ginger Garlic Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry
Description: A quick, savory stir-fry with tender chicken, crisp broccoli, and a glossy ginger garlic sauce.
Ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast thinly sliced. 4 cups broccoli florets. 1 red bell pepper thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced. 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon oyster sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 teaspoons honey. 2 teaspoons cornstarch. 3 tablespoons water. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 2 green onions sliced. 1 pinch red pepper flakes optional.
Instructions: 1. In a small bowl whisk soy sauce oyster sauce rice vinegar honey cornstarch and water until smooth. 2. Spoon 1 tablespoon of the sauce over the chicken and let marinate 10 minutes. 3. Heat neutral oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Stir-fry broccoli and bell pepper for 3 to 4 minutes until crisp tender. Transfer to a plate. 4. Add chicken to the skillet in a single layer and cook 3 to 4 minutes until browned and cooked through. 5. Add garlic and ginger and cook 30 seconds until fragrant. 6. Return vegetables to the pan. Pour in remaining sauce and cook 1 to 2 minutes until thick and glossy. Stir in sesame oil green onions and red pepper flakes. 7. Serve hot.

Recipe Name: Hoisin Beef and Rainbow Vegetable Stir-Fry
Description: Tender beef and colorful vegetables tossed in a sweet savory hoisin glaze.
Ingredients: 1 pound flank steak thinly sliced against the grain. 2 cups broccoli florets. 1 cup carrot matchsticks. 1 cup sugar snap peas trimmed. 1 small red onion thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced. 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce. 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 teaspoons cornstarch. 3 tablespoons water. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper.
Instructions: 1. Whisk hoisin soy sauce rice vinegar cornstarch and water until smooth. 2. Toss steak with black pepper and 1 tablespoon of the sauce. 3. Heat neutral oil in a large skillet over high heat. Stir-fry steak 2 to 3 minutes until just browned. Transfer to a plate. 4. Add broccoli carrots snap peas and red onion and stir-fry 3 to 4 minutes. 5. Add garlic and ginger and cook 30 seconds. 6. Return steak to the pan. Pour in remaining sauce and cook 1 to 2 minutes until thickened. 7. Stir in sesame oil and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Serve.

Description: A crunchy cashew and tofu stir-fry with a balanced sweet heat and loads of veggies.
Ingredients: 14 ounces extra firm tofu drained and pressed cut into 1 inch cubes. 1 red bell pepper sliced. 1 zucchini sliced. 1 cup sugar snap peas. 1 cup cremini mushrooms sliced. 1/2 cup unsalted cashews. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced. 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon maple syrup. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 teaspoon chili garlic sauce. 2 teaspoons cornstarch. 3 tablespoons water. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 2 green onions sliced.
Instructions: 1. Whisk soy sauce maple syrup rice vinegar chili garlic sauce cornstarch and water until smooth. 2. Pat tofu dry. Heat half the neutral oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat and brown tofu on all sides for 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer to a plate. 3. Add remaining oil and stir-fry bell pepper zucchini snap peas and mushrooms for 4 minutes. 4. Add garlic and ginger and cook 30 seconds. 5. Return tofu to the pan. Pour in sauce and cook 2 minutes until thick and glossy. 6. Stir in sesame oil cashews and green onions. Serve hot.

Recipe Name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp and Snow Pea Stir-Fry
Description: Bright and zesty shrimp with crisp snow peas in a light lemon garlic sauce.
Ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp peeled and deveined. 2 cups snow peas trimmed. 1 red bell pepper thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1 teaspoon fresh ginger minced. 1 teaspoon lemon zest. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 2 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 teaspoons honey. 2 teaspoons cornstarch. 3 tablespoons water. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper.
Instructions: 1. Whisk soy sauce lemon juice rice vinegar honey cornstarch and water until smooth then stir in lemon zest. 2. Pat shrimp dry and season with black pepper. 3. Heat neutral oil over medium high heat. Stir-fry shrimp for 2 minutes until just pink then transfer to a plate. 4. Stir-fry snow peas and bell pepper for 2 to 3 minutes until crisp tender. 5. Add garlic and ginger and cook 30 seconds. 6. Return shrimp to the pan. Add sauce and cook 1 to 2 minutes until thickened. 7. Finish with sesame oil and serve immediately.

Recipe Name: Sesame Beef and Green Bean Stir-Fry
Description: A savory sesame beef stir-fry with snappy green beans and aromatic ginger.
Ingredients: 1 pound lean sirloin thinly sliced. 3 cups green beans trimmed. 1 small yellow onion thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger minced. 3 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon oyster sauce. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 1 teaspoon brown sugar. 2 teaspoons cornstarch. 3 tablespoons water. 1 tablespoon neutral oil. 1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds. 1 small red chili thinly sliced optional.
Instructions: 1. Whisk soy sauce oyster sauce rice vinegar brown sugar cornstarch and water until smooth. 2. Heat neutral oil in a large skillet over high heat. Stir-fry green beans and onion for 4 minutes until crisp tender then transfer to a plate. 3. Stir-fry beef for 2 to 3 minutes until browned. 4. Add garlic ginger and chili and cook 30 seconds until fragrant. 5. Return vegetables to the pan. Pour in sauce and cook 1 to 2 minutes until thick and glossy. 6. Stir in sesame oil and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Serve hot.

Description: A classic inside out roll filled with creamy avocado, crisp cucumber, and sweet crab, finished with sesame seeds.
Ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, rinsed until water runs clear. 2 ¼ cups water. ¼ cup rice vinegar. 1 tablespoon sugar. 1 teaspoon fine salt. 4 sheets nori. 200 g imitation crab sticks, shredded. 1 ripe avocado, sliced. 1 small cucumber, cut into matchsticks. 2 tablespoons mayonnaise. 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds
Instructions: 1. Cook the rinsed rice with water in a rice cooker or pot until tender, then rest covered for 10 minutes. 2. In a small bowl dissolve sugar and salt in rice vinegar. 3. Transfer hot rice to a wide bowl and gently fold in the vinegar mixture until glossy, then cool to room temperature. 4. Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat, spread a thin even layer of rice over the nori, and sprinkle with sesame seeds. 5. Flip the sheet so rice faces down. Arrange crab, avocado, cucumber, and a thin line of mayonnaise along the lower third. 6. Roll tightly using the mat, pressing to seal, then repeat with remaining ingredients. 7. Slice each roll into 8 pieces with a wet sharp knife and serve

Description: A bold roll featuring sushi grade tuna tossed in a creamy spicy sauce with cool cucumber for balance.
Ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, rinsed. 2 ¼ cups water. ¼ cup rice vinegar. 1 tablespoon sugar. 1 teaspoon salt. 4 sheets nori. 250 g sushi grade tuna, finely diced. 2 tablespoons mayonnaise. 1 to 2 teaspoons sriracha. 1 teaspoon sesame oil. 1 small cucumber, cut into matchsticks. 1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds
Instructions: 1. Cook and season the sushi rice with the vinegar, sugar, and salt, then cool to room temperature. 2. In a bowl mix tuna, mayonnaise, sriracha, and sesame oil until combined. 3. Place nori on a bamboo mat and spread a thin layer of rice evenly over the sheet. 4. Add a strip of spicy tuna and a line of cucumber along the lower third. 5. Roll tightly, press to seal, and repeat with remaining sheets. 6. Sprinkle rolls with sesame seeds, slice into bite size pieces, and serve

Description: Tender slices of sushi grade salmon draped over vinegared rice pillows with a whisper of wasabi.
Ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, rinsed. 2 ¼ cups water. ¼ cup rice vinegar. 1 tablespoon sugar. 1 teaspoon salt. 400 g sushi grade salmon, sliced into thin rectangles. Wasabi paste to taste. Small bowl of water with a splash of rice vinegar for shaping
Instructions: 1. Cook the sushi rice with water, then season with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, folding gently and cooling until just warm. 2. Wet hands lightly with the vinegared water and form small oblong mounds of rice about the size of two bites. 3. Dab a tiny amount of wasabi on each salmon slice. 4. Place the salmon over a rice mound and press gently to adhere, tucking edges if needed. 5. Repeat with remaining rice and salmon. 6. Serve immediately

Description: A fresh and colorful roll packed with avocado, cucumber, carrot, and bell pepper for a light plant based bite.
Ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, rinsed. 2 ¼ cups water. ¼ cup rice vinegar. 1 tablespoon sugar. 1 teaspoon salt. 4 sheets nori. 1 ripe avocado, sliced. 1 small cucumber, cut into matchsticks. 1 small carrot, cut into matchsticks. ½ red bell pepper, thinly sliced. 2 tablespoons pickled radish, chopped. 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds
Instructions: 1. Cook the rice and season with the vinegar, sugar, and salt, then cool to room temperature. 2. Place nori on a bamboo mat and spread a thin layer of rice evenly over the surface. 3. Arrange avocado, cucumber, carrot, bell pepper, and pickled radish along the lower third. 4. Roll tightly with the mat, pressing to seal. 5. Sprinkle the outside with sesame seeds. 6. Slice into pieces and serve

Description: A crunchy indulgent roll featuring light tempura shrimp with creamy avocado and crisp cucumber.
Ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, rinsed. 2 ¼ cups water. ¼ cup rice vinegar. 1 tablespoon sugar. 1 teaspoon salt. 4 sheets nori. 12 large shrimp, peeled and deveined, tails on. ½ cup all purpose flour. ½ cup cornstarch. ½ teaspoon baking powder. ¾ cup ice cold seltzer water. Neutral oil for frying. 1 ripe avocado, sliced. 1 small cucumber, cut into matchsticks. 2 tablespoons mayonnaise. Soy sauce for serving
Instructions: 1. Heat oil in a deep pot to 175 C. 2. Whisk flour, cornstarch, baking powder, and cold seltzer into a light batter. 3. Pat shrimp dry, dip in batter, and fry in batches until golden and crisp, then drain on a rack. 4. Cook and season the sushi rice with the vinegar, sugar, and salt, then cool. 5. Place nori on a bamboo mat, spread an even layer of rice, and flip so rice faces down. 6. Arrange two tempura shrimp, avocado, cucumber, and a thin line of mayonnaise along the lower third. 7. Roll tightly, press to seal, and repeat. 8. Slice and serve while shrimp are still crisp

Description: Savory seasoned ground beef tucked into warm corn tortillas with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and cheddar.
Ingredients: 1 lb lean ground beef. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 small onion, diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon chili powder. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. 8 small corn tortillas. 1 cup shredded lettuce. 1 cup diced tomatoes. 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese. 1/4 cup chopped cilantro. 1 lime, cut into wedges
Instructions: 1. Warm a skillet over medium heat and add olive oil. 2. Add onion and cook until translucent, then stir in garlic for 30 seconds. 3. Add ground beef and cook, breaking it up, until browned. 4. Stir in chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, oregano, salt, and pepper, and simmer 2 minutes. 5. Warm tortillas in a dry pan or over a flame. 6. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar, and cilantro, and serve with lime wedges.

Recipe Name: Grilled Chicken Tacos with Pico de Gallo
Description: Juicy lime chili chicken layered in corn tortillas with crunchy cabbage, creamy avocado, and fresh pico.
Ingredients: 1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs. 1 tablespoon olive oil. Juice of 1 lime. 1 teaspoon chili powder. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 8 small corn tortillas. 1 cup pico de gallo. 1/2 cup crumbled queso fresco. 1 cup shredded cabbage. 1 avocado, sliced. 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
Instructions: 1. In a bowl combine olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, and salt. 2. Toss chicken with marinade and let sit 15 minutes. 3. Grill or pan cook chicken over medium high heat until cooked through, then slice. 4. Warm tortillas. 5. Assemble with cabbage, chicken, pico de gallo, avocado, queso fresco, and cilantro. 6. Serve immediately.

Recipe Name: Spicy Shrimp Tacos with Cilantro Lime Slaw
Description: Zesty sautéed shrimp paired with a cool yogurt cabbage slaw and creamy avocado.
Ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 teaspoon chili powder. 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1/4 teaspoon cayenne. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 8 small corn tortillas. 2 cups shredded cabbage. 1/4 cup plain Greek yogurt. 1 tablespoon mayonnaise. Juice of 1 lime. 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro. 1 teaspoon honey. 1 avocado, sliced
Instructions: 1. Pat shrimp dry and toss with chili powder, smoked paprika, cayenne, and salt. 2. In a bowl mix cabbage, yogurt, mayonnaise, lime juice, cilantro, and honey to make slaw. 3. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium high heat and cook shrimp 1 to 2 minutes per side until opaque. 4. Warm tortillas. 5. Fill tortillas with slaw, shrimp, and avocado slices. 6. Serve at once.

Recipe Name: Veggie Black Bean and Sweet Potato Tacos
Description: Hearty roasted sweet potatoes and black beans with corn, salsa, and avocado for a satisfying meatless taco.
Ingredients: 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 teaspoon chili powder. 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1/2 teaspoon salt. 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed. 8 small corn tortillas. 1 small red onion, thinly sliced. 1 cup corn kernels. 1/2 cup salsa. 1/4 cup chopped cilantro. 1 avocado, diced. Juice of 1 lime
Instructions: 1. Toss diced sweet potatoes with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, and salt, then roast at 425 F until tender. 2. Warm black beans in a small pot. 3. Warm tortillas. 4. Assemble tacos with sweet potatoes, black beans, onion, corn, salsa, avocado, and cilantro. 5. Squeeze lime juice over the tacos and serve.

Recipe Name: Breakfast Scrambled Egg and Avocado Tacos
Description: Fluffy scrambled eggs, creamy avocado, and melty cheese wrapped in warm tortillas with bright salsa.
Ingredients: 6 large eggs. 2 teaspoons olive oil. 1/4 teaspoon salt. 1/8 teaspoon black pepper. 8 small corn tortillas. 1 avocado, sliced. 1/2 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese. 1/2 cup salsa. 1/4 cup chopped scallions. 1/4 cup chopped cilantro. 1 lime, cut into wedges
Instructions: 1. Beat eggs with salt and pepper. 2. Warm a nonstick skillet over medium heat, add olive oil, and scramble eggs until just set. 3. Warm tortillas. 4. Fill tortillas with eggs, avocado, cheese, salsa, scallions, and cilantro. 5. Serve with lime wedges.

Description: A bright, simple salmon entree with zesty lemon, garlic, and fresh dill.
Ingredients: 4 salmon fillets, about 5 ounces each. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 3 garlic cloves, minced. 2 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1 lemon, thinly sliced
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F and line a baking sheet with parchment. 2. Pat salmon dry and place skin-side down on the sheet. 3. In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, dill, salt, and pepper. 4. Brush the mixture over the salmon and top with lemon slices. 5. Bake 10 to 12 minutes, until salmon flakes easily with a fork. 6. Rest 3 minutes before serving.

Description: A satisfying bowl with glazed salmon, nutty brown rice, and crisp broccoli.
Ingredients: 4 salmon fillets, about 5 ounces each. 3 cups cooked brown rice. 3 cups broccoli florets, steamed. 1/4 cup low-sodium soy sauce. 1 tablespoon honey. 1 tablespoon rice vinegar. 2 garlic cloves, minced. 1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger. 1 teaspoon cornstarch mixed with 1 tablespoon water. 2 tablespoons sliced green onions. 1 teaspoon sesame seeds
Instructions: 1. Whisk soy sauce, honey, vinegar, garlic, ginger, and cornstarch slurry. 2. Pat salmon dry and place in a skillet over medium heat. 3. Pour in the teriyaki mixture and cook 6 to 8 minutes, turning once, until salmon is just cooked and sauce thickens. 4. Divide rice and broccoli among bowls. 5. Top with salmon and spoon over sauce. 6. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.

Recipe Name: Sheet Pan Salmon with Asparagus and Garlic Potatoes
Description: A one-pan dinner with tender salmon, crisp asparagus, and golden potatoes.
Ingredients: 4 salmon fillets, about 5 ounces each. 1 pound baby potatoes, halved. 1 pound asparagus, trimmed. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 4 garlic cloves, minced. 1 teaspoon lemon zest. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 teaspoon paprika. 1 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F and line a large sheet pan. 2. Toss potatoes with 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, half the garlic, paprika, half the salt, and half the pepper. Roast 15 minutes. 3. Push potatoes to one side, add asparagus with 1 tablespoon olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper. 4. Place salmon on the pan, brush with remaining 1/2 tablespoon oil, sprinkle remaining garlic, lemon zest, and lemon juice. 5. Roast 10 to 12 minutes more, until potatoes are tender and salmon flakes. 6. Serve hot.

Description: Pan-seared salmon in a rich garlic cream sauce with spinach and sun-dried tomatoes.
Ingredients: 4 salmon fillets, about 5 ounces each. 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 tablespoon butter. 3 garlic cloves, minced. 1/3 cup sun-dried tomatoes, chopped. 3/4 cup heavy cream. 1/2 cup low-sodium chicken broth. 4 cups baby spinach. 1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
Instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, season salmon with salt and pepper, and sear 3 to 4 minutes per side. Remove to a plate. 2. Add butter and garlic to the skillet and cook 30 seconds. 3. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, cream, and broth. Simmer 3 minutes. 4. Add spinach and Parmesan, stirring until spinach wilts and sauce thickens. 5. Return salmon to the pan and simmer 2 minutes to heat through. 6. Sprinkle Italian seasoning and serve.

Description: A hearty breakfast of creamy avocado on whole-grain toast topped with smoked salmon and tangy capers.
Ingredients: 4 slices whole-grain bread, toasted. 1 large ripe avocado, mashed. 6 ounces smoked salmon. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 1 tablespoon capers, rinsed. 2 tablespoons finely sliced red onion. 1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped. Black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Mash avocado with lemon juice and a pinch of pepper. 2. Spread avocado on the toast slices. 3. Top with smoked salmon. 4. Sprinkle capers, red onion, and dill over the top. 5. Cut toasts in halves if desired and serve immediately.

Description: A rich and comforting risotto loaded with sautéed mushrooms and finished with butter and Parmesan.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups arborio rice. 5 cups low-sodium vegetable broth, kept warm. 1/2 cup dry white wine. 1 pound cremini mushrooms, sliced. 1 small yellow onion, finely diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter. 3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Warm the broth in a saucepan over low heat. 2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a wide pot over medium heat, add mushrooms, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned, then transfer to a bowl. 3. Add remaining olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter to the pot, add onion and garlic, and cook until translucent. 4. Stir in rice and toast for 2 minutes, stirring. 5. Pour in wine and stir until absorbed. 6. Add warm broth a ladle at a time, stirring often and adding more as absorbed, until rice is creamy and al dente, about 18 to 20 minutes. 7. Stir in mushrooms, remaining butter, and Parmesan, season to taste, cover and rest 2 minutes. 8. Sprinkle with parsley and serve hot.

Description: A bright and zesty risotto with tender asparagus, lemon zest, and Parmesan.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups arborio rice. 5 cups low-sodium vegetable or chicken broth, kept warm. 1/2 cup dry white wine. 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces. 1 small onion, finely diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 tablespoon lemon zest. 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Warm the broth in a saucepan over low heat. 2. In a wide pot, heat olive oil over medium heat, add onion and garlic, and cook until translucent. 3. Stir in rice and toast for 2 minutes. 4. Add wine and stir until absorbed. 5. Add warm broth a ladle at a time, stirring often. After 10 minutes, stir in asparagus and continue adding broth until rice is creamy and al dente, about 18 to 20 minutes total. 6. Remove from heat and stir in butter, Parmesan, lemon zest, and lemon juice, then season to taste. 7. Rest 2 minutes, garnish with parsley, and serve.

Description: A luxurious seafood risotto with seared shrimp and scallops folded into a creamy, savory base.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups arborio rice. 5 cups low-sodium seafood or chicken broth, kept warm. 1/2 cup dry white wine. 12 ounces large shrimp, peeled and deveined. 8 ounces sea scallops, patted dry. 1 small onion, finely diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons unsalted butter. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice. 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped. Salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes to taste
Instructions: 1. Warm the broth in a saucepan over low heat. 2. Season shrimp and scallops with salt and pepper, sear in 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium high heat until just opaque, then transfer to a plate. 3. In the same pot, add remaining olive oil and half the butter, cook onion and garlic until translucent. 4. Stir in rice and toast for 2 minutes. 5. Add wine and stir until absorbed. 6. Add warm broth a ladle at a time, stirring often, until rice is creamy and al dente, about 18 to 20 minutes. 7. Off heat, stir in remaining butter, Parmesan, lemon juice, and seafood, season to taste, rest 2 minutes. 8. Garnish with parsley and serve.

Description: A cozy, slightly sweet risotto with roasted butternut squash and aromatic sage.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups arborio rice. 5 cups low-sodium vegetable broth, kept warm. 1/2 cup dry white wine. 4 cups butternut squash, peeled and 1/2 inch diced. 1 small onion, finely diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 6 fresh sage leaves, chopped. Pinch of ground nutmeg. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Heat oven to 425 F, toss squash with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper, and roast on a sheet pan until tender and caramelized, 20 to 25 minutes. 2. Warm the broth in a saucepan over low heat. 3. In a wide pot, heat remaining olive oil and butter over medium heat, cook onion and garlic until translucent. 4. Stir in rice and toast for 2 minutes. 5. Add wine and stir until absorbed. 6. Add warm broth a ladle at a time, stirring often, until rice is nearly al dente, about 16 minutes. 7. Stir in roasted squash, sage, and more broth as needed until creamy and al dente, then fold in Parmesan, nutmeg, and season to taste. 8. Rest 2 minutes and serve.

Recipe Name: Spinach and Sun Dried Tomato Risotto
Description: A savory risotto studded with silky spinach and tangy sun dried tomatoes for a bold, Mediterranean twist.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups arborio rice. 5 cups low-sodium vegetable broth, kept warm. 1/2 cup dry white wine. 6 cups baby spinach, roughly chopped. 1/2 cup sun dried tomatoes in oil, drained and chopped. 1 small onion, finely diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter. 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese. 2 tablespoons fresh basil or parsley, chopped. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Warm the broth in a saucepan over low heat. 2. In a wide pot, heat olive oil over medium heat, cook onion and garlic until translucent. 3. Stir in rice and toast for 2 minutes. 4. Add wine and stir until absorbed. 5. Add warm broth a ladle at a time, stirring often, until rice is creamy and nearly al dente, about 16 to 18 minutes. 6. Stir in spinach and sun dried tomatoes and cook until spinach wilts and rice is al dente, then remove from heat. 7. Fold in butter, Parmesan, herbs, and season to taste, rest 2 minutes and serve.

Recipe Name: Creamy Coconut Vegetable Curry with Basmati Rice
Description: A rich, aromatic curry packed with colorful vegetables and creamy coconut, served with fluffy basmati rice.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil. 1 medium onion, diced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced. 2 tablespoons curry powder. 1/2 teaspoon turmeric. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1/2 teaspoon red chili flakes. 1 can (14 oz) full-fat coconut milk. 1/2 cup vegetable broth. 3 cups cauliflower florets. 1 cup sliced carrots. 1 red bell pepper, sliced. 1 cup green peas. 1 tablespoon lime juice. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro. 2 cups cooked basmati rice. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat and sauté onion for 3 to 4 minutes until translucent. 2. Add garlic and ginger and cook 1 minute until fragrant, then stir in curry powder, turmeric, cumin, and chili flakes for 30 seconds. 3. Pour in coconut milk and vegetable broth and bring to a gentle simmer. 4. Add cauliflower and carrots, cover, and cook 8 minutes, then add bell pepper and peas and simmer 4 to 5 minutes until tender. 5. Stir in lime juice and cilantro, season with salt and pepper, and serve hot with the cooked basmati rice.

Recipe Name: Chicken Tikka Masala with Basmati Rice
Description: A classic creamy tomato-based curry with tender yogurt-marinated chicken, perfect over basmati rice.
Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-size pieces. 1/2 cup plain yogurt. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 2 teaspoons garam masala. 2 teaspoons paprika. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 teaspoon salt. 1 tablespoon vegetable oil. 1 tablespoon unsalted butter. 1 large onion, finely chopped. 4 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger. 1 1/2 cups tomato puree. 1/2 cup heavy cream. 1 teaspoon sugar. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro. 2 cups cooked basmati rice. Black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. In a bowl combine chicken, yogurt, lemon juice, garam masala, paprika, cumin, salt, and black pepper and marinate 15 to 30 minutes. 2. Heat oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat, add onion and cook 5 minutes until soft. 3. Add garlic and ginger and cook 1 minute, then stir in tomato puree and sugar and simmer 5 minutes. 4. Add marinated chicken, cover, and simmer 12 to 15 minutes until cooked through. 5. Stir in cream and cilantro and simmer 2 minutes more, adjust seasoning, and serve with the cooked basmati rice.

Recipe Name: Chickpea and Spinach Curry with Brown Rice
Description: A hearty, tomato-coconut chickpea curry folded with fresh spinach, served with nutty brown rice.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil. 1 medium onion, chopped. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger. 2 tablespoons curry powder. 1 teaspoon ground cumin. 1 teaspoon ground coriander. 1 teaspoon smoked paprika. 1/2 teaspoon red chili flakes. 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes. 1 cup light coconut milk. 1/2 cup vegetable broth. 2 cans (15 oz each) chickpeas, drained and rinsed. 6 cups fresh baby spinach. 1 tablespoon lemon juice. 2 cups cooked brown rice. Salt and black pepper to taste
Instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pot over medium heat and sauté onion 4 minutes until softened. 2. Add garlic and ginger and cook 1 minute, then stir in curry powder, cumin, coriander, paprika, and chili flakes for 30 seconds. 3. Add diced tomatoes, coconut milk, and broth, bring to a simmer, then add chickpeas and cook 8 to 10 minutes. 4. Stir in spinach until wilted, add lemon juice, season to taste, and simmer 1 minute. 5. Serve hot with the cooked brown rice.

Recipe Name: Thai Red Curry Shrimp with Jasmine Rice
Description: Fragrant Thai red curry with juicy shrimp, crisp vegetables, and coconut richness, served with jasmine rice.
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil. 2 tablespoons Thai red curry paste. 1 small onion, thinly sliced. 3 cloves garlic, minced. 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger. 1 can (14 oz) coconut milk. 1 tablespoon fish sauce. 1 tablespoon brown sugar. 2 bell peppers, sliced. 1 cup snow peas. 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined. 1 tablespoon lime juice. 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, torn. 2 cups cooked jasmine rice
Instructions: 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, add curry paste, and cook 30 seconds to bloom. 2. Stir in onion, garlic, and ginger and cook 2 minutes until fragrant. 3. Pour in coconut milk, fish sauce, and brown sugar and bring to a gentle simmer. 4. Add bell peppers and snow peas and cook 3 to 4 minutes. 5. Add shrimp and cook 3 to 4 minutes until pink, then stir in lime juice and basil and serve with jasmine rice.

Recipe Name: Japanese Chicken Katsu Curry with Rice
Description: Crispy panko-crusted chicken cutlets with a mild, savory Japanese curry sauce, served over steamed rice.
Ingredients: 4 small boneless skinless chicken breasts. Salt and black pepper to taste. 1/2 cup all-purpose flour. 2 large eggs, beaten. 1 1/2 cups panko breadcrumbs. Neutral oil for frying. 1 tablespoon vegetable oil. 1 large onion, sliced. 1 large carrot, sliced. 1 medium potato, diced. 2 cloves garlic, minced. 3 cups chicken broth. 4 blocks Japanese curry roux. 3 cups cooked short-grain rice
Instructions: 1. Season chicken with salt and pepper, coat in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then press into panko to bread. 2. Fry breaded chicken in hot oil over medium heat 3 to 4 minutes per side until golden and cooked through, then drain on a rack. 3. For the sauce, heat vegetable oil in a pot, sauté onion, carrot, potato, and garlic 4 to 5 minutes. 4. Add chicken broth, bring to a simmer, and cook until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes. 5. Stir in curry roux blocks until dissolved and thickened. 6. Slice katsu, serve over rice, and ladle curry sauce on top.

Description: A rustic mix of carrots, parsnips, potatoes, and onions roasted until caramelized with garlic and herbs.
Ingredients: 3 medium carrots, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces. 2 parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces. 2 medium Yukon gold potatoes, cut into 1 inch chunks. 1 medium red onion, cut into wedges. 3 tablespoons olive oil. 3 garlic cloves, minced. 1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary. 1 teaspoon thyme leaves. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1 teaspoon lemon zest. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F 220°C and line a large baking sheet with parchment. 2. In a large bowl, toss carrots, parsnips, potatoes, and red onion with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper. 3. Spread in an even layer and roast for 25 minutes. 4. Stir and roast 15 to 20 minutes more until tender and caramelized. 5. Toss with lemon zest and parsley and serve hot.

Recipe Name: Balsamic Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Carrots
Description: Crisp-tender Brussels sprouts and sweet carrots glazed with balsamic, garlic, and a hint of maple.
Ingredients: 1 lb Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved. 3 medium carrots, sliced on the bias. 1 small red onion, thinly sliced. 2 tablespoons olive oil. 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar. 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard. 1 teaspoon maple syrup. 2 garlic cloves, minced. 3/4 teaspoon salt. 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes. 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
Instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F 220°C and line a large baking sheet. 2. Whisk olive oil, balsamic, Dijon, maple, garlic, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. 3.
